trans-unit.source: Type "2 + 5." in the shell and then press Enter (carriage return). Notice that you tell the shell you are done entering code by finishing with a full stop "." and a carriage return.
trans-unit.target: 在shell中输入 "2+5.",然后按回车键(回车)。请注意,你用句号"."和回车来告诉shell你已经完成了代码输入。

trans-unit.source: Type "a" to leave the Erlang system.
trans-unit.target: 输入 "a "离开Erlang系统。

trans-unit.source: Type ::= Fun | Mod | App | Rel
trans-unit.target: 输入:: = Fun | Mod | App | Rel

trans-unit.source: Type "GET" | "POST" | "HEAD" | "TRACE", that is, the HTTP method.
trans-unit.target: 输入 "GET" | "POST" | "HEAD" | "TRACE" ，即HTTP方法。

trans-unit.source: Type [{HeaderKey,HeaderValue}]. parsed_header contains all HTTP header fields from the HTTP request stored in a list as key-value tuples. See RFC 2616 for a listing of all header fields. For example, the date field is stored as {"date","Wed, 15 Oct 1997 14:35:17 GMT"}. RFC 2616 defines that HTTP is a case-insensitive protocol and the header fields can be in lower case or upper case. httpd ensures that all header field names are in lower case.
trans-unit.target: 键入 [{HeaderKey,HeaderValue}] 。 parsed_header 包含来自HTTP请求的所有HTTP标头字段，这些字段作为键值元组存储在列表中。有关所有标头字段的列表，请参阅 RFC 2616 。例如，日期字段存储为 {"date","Wed, 15 Oct 1997 14:35:17 GMT"} 。RFC 2616定义HTTP为不区分大小写的协议，并且标头字段可以为小写或大写。 httpd 确保所有标头字段名称都小写。

trans-unit.source: Type [{InteractionKey,InteractionValue}] is used to propagate data between modules. Depicted interaction_data() in function type declarations.
trans-unit.target: 类型 [{InteractionKey,InteractionValue}] 用于在模块之间传播数据。函数类型声明中描述的 interaction_data() 。

trans-unit.source: Type UTF8String is represented as a UTF-8 encoded binary in Erlang. Such binaries can be created directly using the binary syntax or by converting from a list of Unicode code points using function unicode:characters_to_binary/1.
trans-unit.target: UTF8String类型在Erlang中表示为UTF-8编码的二进制。可以使用二进制语法直接创建此类二进制文件，也可以使用 unicode:characters_to_binary/1 函数从Unicode代码点列表进行转换来创建此类二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: Types declared as opaque represent sets of terms whose structure is not supposed to be visible from outside of their defining module. That is, only the module defining them is allowed to depend on their term structure. Consequently, such types do not make much sense as module local - module local types are not accessible by other modules anyway - and is always to be exported.
trans-unit.target: 声明为 opaque 类型表示术语集，这些术语的结构不应从其定义模块的外部看到。也就是说，只允许定义它们的模块取决于它们的术语结构。因此，此类类型的意义不大，因为模块本地-模块本地类型无论如何也不能被其他模块访问-始终要导出。

trans-unit.source: Types describe sets of Erlang terms. Types consist of, and are built from, a set of predefined types, for example, integer(), atom(), and pid(). Predefined types represent a typically infinite set of Erlang terms that belong to this type. For example, the type atom() denotes the set of all Erlang atoms.
trans-unit.target: 类型描述Erlang术语集。类型由一组预定义类型组成，并从中构建，例如， integer() ， atom() 和 pid() 。预定义类型表示属于该类型的典型的Erlang术语的无限集合。例如，类型 atom() 表示所有Erlang原子的集合。

trans-unit.source: Typically high time values are bad and this is often the thing to look for. However, one should also look for high lock acquisition frequencies (#tries) since locks generate overhead and because high frequency could become problematic if they begin to have conflicts even if it is not shown in a particular test.
trans-unit.target: 通常，高 time 值是不好的，这通常是要寻找的东西。但是，由于锁会产生开销，并且即使在特定的测试中未显示冲突，如果高频开始产生冲突，因为高频可能会成为问题，因此也应该寻找较高的锁定获取频率（#tries）。

trans-unit.source: Typically the operator, possibly running hundreds or thousands of test cases, does not want to fill the console with details about, or printouts from, specific test cases. By default, the operator only sees the following:

trans-unit.source: Typically you want to substitute negations first, then aliases, then perform one or more expansions (sometimes you want to pre-expand particular entries before doing the main expansion). You might want to substitute negations and/or aliases repeatedly, to allow such forms in the right-hand side of aliases and expansion lists.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,您希望先替换否定词,然后是别名,然后执行一个或多个扩展(有时您希望在进行主扩展之前对特定条目进行预扩展)。你可能想反复替换否定词和/或别名,以便在别名和扩展列表的右侧允许这种形式。

trans-unit.source: Typically, OpenSSL engines provide a hardware implementation of specific cryptographic operations. The hardware implementation usually offers improved performance over its software-based counterpart, which is known as cryptographic acceleration.
trans-unit.target: 通常,OpenSSL引擎提供了特定加密操作的硬件实现。硬件实现通常比基于软件的对应系统提供更好的性能,这就是所谓的加密加速。

trans-unit.source: UTF-8 is designed so that ISO Latin-1 characters with numbers beyond the 7-bit ASCII range are seldom considered valid when decoded as UTF-8. Therefore one can usually use heuristics to determine if a file is in UTF-8 or if it is encoded in ISO Latin-1 (one byte per character). The unicode module can be used to determine if data can be interpreted as UTF-8:
trans-unit.target: UTF-8的设计使得将数字超出7位ASCII范围的ISO Latin-1字符在解码为UTF-8时很少被视为有效。因此，通常可以使用试探法来确定文件是使用UTF-8格式还是使用ISO Latin-1编码（每个字符一个字节）。所述 unicode 模块可用于确定数据是否可被解释为UTF-8：

trans-unit.source: Unary callback function FormatFun is used by info/1,2 for displaying the call that created the query handle of the table. Defaults to undefined, which means that info/1,2 displays a call to '$MOD':'$FUN'/0. It is up to FormatFun to present the selected objects of the table in a suitable way. However, if a character list is chosen for presentation, it must be an Erlang expression that can be scanned and parsed (a trailing dot is added by info/1,2 though).
trans-unit.target: 一元回调函数 FormatFun 由 info/1,2 使用，以显示创建表查询句柄的调用。默认为 undefined ，这意味着 info/1,2 显示对 '$MOD':'$FUN'/0 的调用。由 FormatFun 决定是否以适当的方式显示表的选定对象。但是，如果选择一个字符列表进行显示，则它必须是一个可以被扫描和解析的Erlang表达式（尽管 info/1,2 添加了一个尾点）。

trans-unit.source: Unary callback function InfoFun is to return information about the table. undefined is to be returned if the value of some tag is unknown:
trans-unit.target: 一元回调函数 InfoFun 将返回有关表的信息。如果某些标签的值未知，则返回 undefined ：

trans-unit.target: 一元回调函数 PreFun 在第一次读取表之前被调用一次。如果调用失败，则查询评估失败。

trans-unit.source: Under the Warnings pull-down menu, there are buttons that control which discrepancies are reported to the user in the Warnings window. By clicking these buttons, you can enable/disable a whole class of warnings. Information about the classes of warnings is found on the "Warnings" item under the Help menu (in the rightmost top corner).
trans-unit.target: 在“ 警告”下拉菜单下，有一些按钮可控制在“ 警告”窗口中向用户报告哪些差异。通过单击这些按钮，可以启用/禁用整个警告类别。有关警告类别的信息，可在“ 帮助”菜单（位于最右上角）下的“警告”项中找到。

trans-unit.source: Under the tag =allocated_areas is shown information similar to what can be obtained on a living node with erlang:system_info(allocated_areas).
trans-unit.target: 标签= allocated_areas下显示的信息类似于可以通过 erlang:system_info(allocated_areas) 在活动节点上获得的信息。

trans-unit.source: Under the tag =allocator:<A> is shown various information about allocator <A>. The information is similar to what can be obtained on a living node with erlang:system_info({allocator, <A>}). For more information, see also erts_alloc(3).
trans-unit.target: 在标记= allocator：<A>下显示了有关分配器<A>的各种信息。该信息类似于可以通过 erlang:system_info({allocator, <A>}) 在活动节点上获得的信息。有关更多信息，另请参见 erts_alloc(3) 。

trans-unit.source: Under the tag =memory is shown information similar to what can be obtainted on a living node with erlang:memory().
trans-unit.target: 在标记= memory下显示的信息类似于可以通过 erlang:memory() 在活动节点上获得的信息。

trans-unit.source: Under the tag =scheduler is shown information about the current state and statistics of the schedulers in the runtime system. On operating systems that allow suspension of other threads, the data within this section reflects what the runtime system looks like when a crash occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在标记= scheduler下显示了有关运行系统中调度程序的当前状态和统计信息。在允许暂停其他线程的操作系统上，此部分中的数据反映了发生崩溃时运行时系统的外观。

trans-unit.source: Under the tags =hash_table:<table_name> and =index_table:<table_name> is shown internal tables. These are mostly of interest for runtime system developers.
trans-unit.target: 内部表在标签= hash_table：<table_name>和= index_table：<table_name>下。这些是运行时系统开发人员最感兴趣的。

trans-unit.source: Undocumented (old) algorithms are deprecated but still implemented so old code relying on them will produce the same pseudo random sequences as before.
trans-unit.target: 未记录的(旧)算法已被废弃,但仍在实施,因此依赖它们的旧代码将产生与之前相同的伪随机序列。

trans-unit.target: 本模块中未记录的功能不得使用。

trans-unit.target: 将ListIn中所有出现的原子 ListIn 为元组 {Atom, true} 。

trans-unit.source: Unicode binary encoded as UTF16 little endian.
trans-unit.target: Unicode二进制编码为UTF16小恩迪。

trans-unit.source: Unicode filename translation is turned on with switch +fnu. On Linux, a VM started without explicitly stating the filename translation mode defaults to latin1 as the native filename encoding. On Windows and MacOS X, the default behavior is that of Unicode filename translation. Therefore file:native_name_encoding/0 by default returns utf8 on those systems (Windows does not use UTF-8 on the file system level, but this can safely be ignored by the Erlang programmer). The default behavior can, as stated earlier, be changed using option +fnu or +fnl to the VM, see the erl program. If the VM is started in Unicode filename translation mode, file:native_name_encoding/0 returns atom utf8. Switch +fnu can be followed by w, i, or e to control how wrongly encoded filenames are to be reported.
trans-unit.target: Unicode文件名转换通过 +fnu 开关打开。在Linux上，未显式说明文件名转换模式而启动的VM默认为 latin1 作为本机文件名编码。在Windows和MacOS X上，默认行为是Unicode文件名转换。因此，默认情况下， file:native_name_encoding/0 在这些系统上返回 utf8 （Windows在文件系统级别上未使用UTF-8，但是Erlang程序员可以放心地忽略它）。默认行为，如前所述，使用，变更选项 +fnu 或 +fnl 的VM，看到 erl 程序。如果VM以Unicode文件名转换模式启动， file:native_name_encoding/0 返回原子 utf8 。开关 +fnu 后面可以跟 w ， i 或 e ,以控制如何报告错误编码的文件名。

trans-unit.source: Unicode is a standard defining code points (numbers) for all known, living or dead, scripts. In principle, every symbol used in any language has a Unicode code point. Unicode code points are defined and published by the Unicode Consortium, which is a non-profit organization.
trans-unit.target: Unicode是一个标准,它为所有已知的、活的或死的文字定义了码点(数字)。原则上,任何语言中使用的每个符号都有一个Unicode码点。Unicode码点由非营利组织Unicode Consortium定义和公布。

trans-unit.source: Unicode metadata stored in PAX headers is preserved
trans-unit.target: 存储在PAX头中的Unicode元数据将被保留

trans-unit.source: Unicode support is basically UTF-8 based. To use Unicode characters, you either call compile/2 or run/3 with option unicode, or the pattern must start with one of these special sequences:
trans-unit.target: Unicode支持基本上基于UTF-8。要使用Unicode字符，请使用 unicode 选项调用 compile/2 或 run/3 ，或者该模式必须以以下特殊序列之一开头：

trans-unit.source: Uniform floats had a non-uniform density so small values i.e less than 0.5 had got smaller intervals decreasing as the generated value approached 0.0 although still uniformly distributed for sufficiently large subranges. The new algorithms produces uniformly distributed floats on the form N * 2.0^(-53) hence equally spaced.
trans-unit.target: Uniform floats具有非均匀的密度,因此小的值,即小于0.5的值在生成值接近0.0的时候会有较小的间隔,尽管在足够大的子范围内仍然是均匀分布的。新算法产生的均匀分布的浮点数为N*2.0^(-53),因此间距相等。

trans-unit.source: Uniform integer ranges had a skew in the probability distribution that was not noticable for small ranges but for large ranges less than the generator's precision the probability to produce a low number could be twice the probability for a high.
trans-unit.target: 统一整数范围的概率分布有一个偏斜,对于小范围的概率分布不明显,但对于小于生成器精度的大范围,产生低数的概率可能是高数概率的两倍。

trans-unit.source: Uniform integer ranges larger than or equal to the generator's precision used a floating point fallback that only calculated with 52 bits which is smaller than the requested range and therefore were not all numbers in the requested range even possible to produce.
trans-unit.target: 大于或等于生成器精度的统一整数范围使用了浮点回落,只用52位计算,而52位比要求的范围小,因此并不是要求范围内的所有数都能生成。

trans-unit.target: 联盟 rsa_digest_type() ， dss_digest_type() ，和 ecdsa_digest_type() 。

trans-unit.target: 运行时系统实例上的唯一整数

trans-unit.target: 在运行时系统实例上的唯一引用。

trans-unit.source: Unique identifier for the application in the scope of the service. Defaults to the value of the dictionary option.

trans-unit.source: Unit Testing is testing of individual program "units" in relative isolation. There is no particular size requirement: a unit can be a function, a module, a process, or even a whole application, but the most typical testing units are individual functions or modules. In order to test a unit, you specify a set of individual tests, set up the smallest necessary environment for being able to run those tests (often, you don't need to do any setup at all), you run the tests and collect the results, and finally you do any necessary cleanup so that the test can be run again later. A Unit Testing Framework tries to help you in each stage of this process, so that it is easy to write tests, easy to run them, and easy to see which tests failed (so you can fix the bugs).
trans-unit.target: 单元测试是对单个程序 "单元 "进行相对独立的测试。没有特定的大小要求:一个单元可以是一个函数、一个模块、一个进程,甚至是整个应用程序,但最典型的测试单元是单个函数或模块。为了测试一个单元,你需要指定一组单独的测试,设置最小的必要环境来运行这些测试(通常情况下,你根本不需要做任何设置),你需要运行测试并收集结果,最后你需要做任何必要的清理工作,以便以后可以再次运行测试。单元测试框架试图在这个过程的每一个阶段帮助你,这样就可以很容易地编写测试,很容易地运行它们,很容易地看到哪些测试失败了(这样你就可以修复错误)。

trans-unit.source: Unless a table of type set, bag, or duplicate_bag is protected using safe_fixtable/2, a traversal can fail if concurrent updates are made to the table. For table type ordered_set, the function returns a list containing object I in Erlang term order.
trans-unit.target: 除非类型的表 set ， bag ，或 duplicate_bag 正在使用保护 safe_fixtable/2 ，如果并发更新是对表进行遍历可能失败。对于表类型 ordered_set ，该函数以Erlang术语顺序返回包含对象 I 的列表。

trans-unit.source: Unless a table of type set, bag, or duplicate_bag is protected using safe_fixtable/2, a traversal can fail if concurrent updates are made to the table. For table type ordered_set, the function returns the next key in order, even if the object does no longer exist.
trans-unit.target: 除非类型的表 set ， bag ，或 duplicate_bag 正在使用保护 safe_fixtable/2 ，如果并发更新是对表进行遍历可能失败。对于表类型 ordered_set ，即使该对象不再存在，该函数也会按顺序返回下一个键。

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise specified by the options, all modules are assumed to be at least "static", and all except the target module are assumed to be "safe". See the static and safe options for details.
trans-unit.target: 除非选项另有说明，否则所有模块均假定为至少“静态”，而目标模块以外的所有模块均假定为“安全”。有关详细信息，请参见 static 和 safe 选项。

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise specified the return value type and encoding are the same as the input type and encoding. That is, binary input returns binary output, list input returns a list output but mixed input returns list output.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有规定,否则返回值类型和编码与输入类型和编码相同。也就是说,二进制输入返回二进制输出,列表输入返回列表输出,但混合输入返回列表输出。

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise specified the return value type is the same as the input type. That is, binary input returns binary output, list input returns a list output, and mixed input can return a mixed output.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有规定,否则返回值类型与输入类型相同。也就是说,二进制输入返回二进制输出,列表输入返回列表输出,混合输入可以返回混合输出。

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise specified, leading whitespace is ignored for all control sequences. An input field cannot be more than one line wide.

trans-unit.source: Unless otherwise stated, all functions assume that position numbering starts at 1. That is, the first element of a list is at position 1.
trans-unit.target: 除非另有说明,否则所有函数都假定位置编号从1开始,也就是说,列表的第一个元素在位置1。

trans-unit.source: Unless specified by the user when the array is created, the default value is the atom undefined. There is no difference between an unset entry and an entry that has been explicitly set to the same value as the default one (compare reset/2). If you need to differentiate between unset and set entries, ensure that the default value cannot be confused with the values of set entries.
trans-unit.target: 除非用户在创建数组时指定，否则默认值为原子 undefined 。未设置的条目和已显式设置为与默认值相同的值（比较 reset/2 ）之间没有区别。如果需要区分未设置条目和设置条目，请确保默认值不能与设置条目的值混淆。

trans-unit.source: Unless the file name is absolute, the file is first searched for relative to the current directory, and then using the normal search path (code:get_path()). This means that the names of typical "app" files can be used directly, without a path, e.g., "mnesia.app".
trans-unit.target: 除非文件名是绝对的，否则首先将相对于当前目录搜索文件，然后使用常规搜索路径（ code:get_path() ）。这意味着可以直接使用典型的“ app”文件的名称，而无需使用路径，例如 "mnesia.app" 。

trans-unit.source: Unloading can be described as the process of telling the emulator that this particular part of the code in this particular process (that is, this user) no longer needs the driver. That can, if there are no other users, trigger unloading of the driver, in which case the driver name disappears from the system and (if possible) the memory occupied by the driver executable code is reclaimed.
trans-unit.target: 卸载可以描述为告诉仿真器该特定过程中该代码的特定部分（即该 user ）不再需要驱动程序的过程。如果没有其他用户，则可以触发驱动程序的卸载，在这种情况下，驱动程序名称将从系统中消失，并且（如果可能）回收驱动程序可执行代码占用的内存。

trans-unit.source: Unloads, or at least dereferences the driver named Name. If the caller is the last user of the driver, all remaining open ports using the driver are killed with reason driver_unloaded and the driver eventually gets unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 卸载或至少取消引用名为 Name 的驱动程序。如果调用方是驱动程序的最后一个 user ，则使用 driver_unloaded 原因杀死使用该驱动程序的所有剩余打开端口，并最终卸载该驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: Unloads, or at least dereferences the driver named Name. If the caller is the last user of the driver, and no more open ports use the driver, the driver gets unloaded. Otherwise, unloading is delayed until all ports are closed and no users remain.
trans-unit.target: 卸载或至少取消引用名为 Name 的驱动程序。如果调用方是驱动程序的最后一个 user ，并且不再有打开的端口使用该驱动程序，则该驱动程序将被卸载。否则，卸载将被延迟，直到所有端口都关闭并且没有 users 可用为止。

trans-unit.source: Up until ERTS version 8.*, the check process code operation checks for all types of references to the old code. That is, direct references (e.g. return addresses on the process stack), indirect references (funs in process context), and references to literals in the code.

trans-unit.source: Updates Key to value Value in Tree1 and returns the new tree. Assumes that the key is present in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 更新 Key 价值 Value 在 Tree1 并返回新树。假定该键存在于树中。

trans-unit.source: Updates a running Adler-32 checksum for Data. If Data is the empty binary or the empty iolist, this function returns the required initial value for the checksum.
trans-unit.target: 更新 Data 的正在运行的Adler-32校验和。如果 Data 是空的二进制文件或空的iolist，则此函数返回校验和所需的初始值。

trans-unit.source: Updates a running CRC checksum for Data. If Data is the empty binary or the empty iolist, this function returns the required initial value for the CRC.
trans-unit.target: 更新 Data 的运行CRC校验和。如果 Data 是空二进制或空iolist，则此函数返回CRC所需的初始值。

trans-unit.source: Updates a value in a dictionary by calling Fun on the value to get a new value. An exception is generated if Key is not present in the dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用值上的 Fun 以获取新值来更新字典中的值。如果字典中不存在 Key ,则会生成一个异常。

trans-unit.source: Updates a value in a dictionary by calling Fun on the value to get a new value. If Key is not present in the dictionary, Initial is stored as the first value. For example, append/3 can be defined as follows:

trans-unit.source: Updates a value in a dictionary by calling Fun on the value to get a new value. If Key is not present in the dictionary, Initial is stored as the first value. For example, append/3 can be defined as:
trans-unit.target: 通过调用值上的 Fun 以获取新值来更新字典中的值。如果字典中不存在 Key ，则将 Initial 作为第一个值存储。例如， append/3 可以定义为：

trans-unit.source: Updates an accumulator by applying Fun on each collection of annotations of the erl_parse tree Abstr. The first call to Fun has AccIn as argument, the returned accumulator AccOut is passed to the next call, and so on. The final value of the accumulator is returned. The erl_parse tree is traversed in a depth-first, left-to-right fashion.
trans-unit.target: 更新应用累加器 Fun 上的注释的每个集合 erl_parse 树 Abstr 。第一个通话 Fun 有 AccIn 作为参数，蓄能器返回的 AccOut 被传递到下一个电话，等等。返回累加器的最终值。该 erl_parse 树的深度优先，左到右的方式运行。

trans-unit.source: Updates information about debugged processes. Information about all terminated processes are removed from the window. All Attach Process windows for terminated processes are closed.
trans-unit.target: 更新已调试进程的信息。从窗口中删除所有终止进程的信息。关闭所有终止进程的附加进程窗口。

trans-unit.source: Updates the HMAC represented by Context using the given Data. Context must have been generated using an HMAC init function (such as hmac_init). Data can be any length. NewContext must be passed into the next call to hmac_update or to one of the functions hmac_final and hmac_final_n
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的 Data 更新由 Context 表示的HMAC 。必须使用HMAC初始化函数（例如 hmac_init ）生成 Context 。 Data 可以是任何长度。必须将 NewContext 传递给下一次对 hmac_update 或函数 hmac_final 和 hmac_final_n 的调用

trans-unit.source: Updates the digest represented by Context using the given Data. Context must have been generated using hash_init or a previous call to this function. Data can be any length. NewContext must be passed into the next call to hash_update or hash_final.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的 Data 更新由 Context 表示的摘要。必须使用 hash_init 或对该函数的先前调用来生成 Context 。 Data 可以是任何长度。必须将 NewContext 传递到对 hash_update 或 hash_final 的下一个调用中。

trans-unit.source: Updates the hook function field of the prettyprinter context.
trans-unit.target: 更新prettyprinter上下文的钩子函数字段。

trans-unit.source: Updates the line widh field of the prettyprinter context.
trans-unit.target: 更新prettyprinter上下文的行宽字段。

trans-unit.source: Updates the object with key Key stored in table Name of type set by adding Incr to the element at the Pos:th position. The new counter value is returned. If no position is specified, the element directly following the key is updated.
trans-unit.target: 更新用键的对象 Key 存储在表 Name 类型的 set 加入 Incr 于在所述元件 Pos ：个位置。返回新的计数器值。如果未指定位置，则更新键之后的元素。

trans-unit.source: Updates the operator precedence field of the prettyprinter context. See the erl_parse(3) module for operator precedences.
trans-unit.target: 更新prettyprinter上下文的运算符优先级字段。有关操作符优先级，请参见 erl_parse(3) 模块。

trans-unit.source: Updates the paper widh field of the prettyprinter context.
trans-unit.target: 更新prettyprinter上下文的纸张宽度字段。

trans-unit.source: Updates the user data field of the prettyprinter context.
trans-unit.target: 更新prettyprinter上下文的用户数据字段。

trans-unit.source: Updating a map has a similar syntax as constructing it.
trans-unit.target: 更新地图的语法与构建地图的语法相似。

trans-unit.source: Upgrade the connection associated with Handle to a tls connection if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，将与 Handle 关联的连接升级为tls连接。

trans-unit.source: Upgrades a gen_tcp, or equivalent, connected socket to an TLS socket, that is, performs the client-side TLS handshake.
trans-unit.target: 将 gen_tcp 或等效的连接套接字升级到TLS套接字，即执行客户端TLS握手。

trans-unit.source: Upgrades an application App from the current version to a new version located in Dir according to the .appup file.
trans-unit.target: 根据 .appup 文件，将应用程序 App 从当前版本升级到 Dir 中的新版本。

trans-unit.source: Upon failure to reopen the log, the disk log process terminates with the EXIT message {{failed,Error},[{disk_log,Fun,Arity}]}. Other processes having requests queued receive the message {disk_log, Node, {error, disk_log_stopped}}.
trans-unit.target: 重新打开日志失败时，磁盘日志进程将以EXIT消息 {{failed,Error},[{disk_log,Fun,Arity}]} 终止。 {disk_log, Node, {error, disk_log_stopped}} 请求排队的其他进程收到消息{disk_log，Node，{error，disk_log_stopped}}。

trans-unit.source: Uppercase letter
trans-unit.target: 大写字母

trans-unit.source: Uppercase letters
trans-unit.target: 大写字母

trans-unit.source: Uppercase letters signify real identifiers and lowercase letters signify fake identifiers only used for description of the topology. Identifiers passed as real identifiers can be used by the runtime system when trying to access specific hardware; if they are incorrect the behavior is undefined. Faked logical CPU identifiers are not accepted, as there is no point in defining the CPU topology without real logical CPU identifiers. Thread, core, processor, and node identifiers can be omitted. If omitted, the thread ID defaults to t0, the core ID defaults to c0, the processor ID defaults to p0, and the node ID is left undefined. Either each logical processor must belong to only one NUMA node, or no logical processors must belong to any NUMA nodes.
trans-unit.target: 大写字母表示真实标识符，小写字母表示仅用于描述拓扑的伪造标识符。尝试访问特定硬件时，运行时系统可以使用作为真实标识符传递的标识符。如果它们不正确，则行为是不确定的。不接受伪造的逻辑CPU标识符，因为没有实际逻辑CPU标识符就没有必要定义CPU拓扑。线程，核心，处理器和节点标识符可以省略。如果省略，则线程ID默认为 t0 ，内核ID默认为 c0 ，处理器ID默认为 p0 ，并且节点ID未定义。每个逻辑处理器必须仅属于一个NUMA节点，或者没有逻辑处理器必须属于任何NUMA节点。

trans-unit.source: Uri data types
trans-unit.target: Uri数据类型

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: Usage

trans-unit.source: Usage example:
trans-unit.target: 用例。

trans-unit.source: Use change_key/2 with an absolute path after open.
trans-unit.target: 使用 change_key/2 与后绝对路径 open 。

trans-unit.source: Use enif_monitor_process together with enif_select to detect failing Erlang processes and prevent them from causing permanent leakage of resources and their contained OS event objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用 enif_monitor_process 连同 enif_select 检测失败的Erlang进程，并阻止它们引起的资源和它们所包含OS事件对象的持续泄漏。

trans-unit.source: Use gen_tcp:shutdown(Sock, write) to signal that no more data is to be sent and wait for the read side of the socket to be closed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gen_tcp:shutdown(Sock, write) 发出信号，表示不再发送任何数据，并等待套接字的读取端关闭。

trans-unit.source: Use erlang:system_time/1 to retrieve the current Erlang system time on the time unit of your choice.
trans-unit.target: 使用 erlang:system_time/1 以您选择的 time unit 检索当前的Erlang系统时间。

trans-unit.source: Use net_adm:ping(Node) instead.
trans-unit.target: 请改用 net_adm:ping(Node) 。

trans-unit.source: Use ttb:list_history/0 to see the content of the history buffer and ttb:run_history/1 to re-execute one of the entries.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ttb:list_history/0 查看历史记录缓冲区的内容，并使用 ttb:run_history/1 重新执行其中一项。

trans-unit.source: Use ERL_NIF_SELECT_STOP as mode in order to safely close an event object that has been passed to enif_select. The stop callback of the resource obj will be called when it is safe to close the event object. This safe way of closing event objects must be used even if all notifications have been received and no further calls to enif_select have been made.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ERL_NIF_SELECT_STOP 作为 mode ，以安全地关闭已传递给 enif_select 的事件对象。当可以安全关闭事件对象时，将调用资源 obj 的 stop 回调。即使已收到所有通知并且没有对 enif_select 进行进一步调用，也必须使用这种安全的关闭事件对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use M-x compile to compile an MIB from inside Emacs, and enter:
trans-unit.target: 使用 M-x compile 从Emacs内部编译MIB，然后输入：

trans-unit.source: Use cover:is_compiled/1 or code:which/1 to see if a module is Cover compiled (and still loaded) or not.
trans-unit.target: 使用 cover:is_compiled/1 或 code:which/1 来查看模块是否经过Cover编译（并仍然加载）。

trans-unit.source: Use cover:start/1 and cover:stop/1 to add or remove nodes. The same Cover compiled code will be loaded on each node, and analysis will collect and sum up coverage data results from all nodes.
trans-unit.target: 使用 cover:start/1 和 cover:stop/1 可以添加或删除节点。相同的Cover编译代码将加载到每个节点上，分析将收集并汇总所有节点的coverage数据结果。

trans-unit.source: Use driver_alloc_binary() to allocate a binary.
trans-unit.target: 使用 driver_alloc_binary() 分配二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: Use erlang:get_cookie() in ERTS instead.
trans-unit.target: 在ERTS中使用 erlang:get_cookie() 代替。

trans-unit.source: Use erlang:now/0 to retrieve the current Erlang system time.
trans-unit.target: 使用 erlang:now/0 检索当前的Erlang系统时间。

trans-unit.source: Use erlang:set_cookie(node(),Cookie)in ERTS instead.
trans-unit.target: erlang:set_cookie(node(),Cookie)in ERTS 使用erlang：set_cookie（node（），Cookie）。

trans-unit.source: Use hipe:help_options/0 to print out the available options.
trans-unit.target: 使用 hipe:help_options/0 打印出可用选项。

trans-unit.source: Use Compiler option {debug_info_key,Key}, see compile(3) and function crypto_key_fun/1 to register a fun that returns the key whenever beam_lib must decrypt the debug information.
trans-unit.target: 使用编译器选项 {debug_info_key,Key} ，请参见 compile(3) 和函数 crypto_key_fun/1 来注册一个有趣的函数，该函数可以在 beam_lib 必须解密调试信息时返回密钥。

trans-unit.source: Use Dialyzer from the command line to detect defects in the specified files or directories containing .erl or .beam files, depending on the type of the analysis.
trans-unit.target: 从命令行使用Dialyzer来检测指定文件或包含 .erl 或 .beam 文件的目录中的缺陷，具体取决于分析的类型。

trans-unit.source: Use Mnesia with the following types of applications:
trans-unit.target: 将Mnesia用于以下类型的应用:

trans-unit.source: Use STDLIB application variable restricted_shell and specify, as its value, the name of the callback module. Example (with callback functions implemented in callback_mod.erl): $ erl -stdlib restricted_shell callback_mod.
trans-unit.target: 使用STDLIB应用程序变量 restricted_shell 并指定，作为其值，则回调模块的名称。例如（在实现的回调函数 callback_mod.erl ）： $ erl -stdlib restricted_shell callback_mod 。

trans-unit.source: Use a parameterized query to insert many rows in one go.
trans-unit.target: 使用参数化查询,一次性插入多条记录。

trans-unit.source: Use a specified algorithm with a constant seed:
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的算法与恒定的种子。

trans-unit.source: Use a specified algorithm:
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的算法。

trans-unit.source: Use active mode only if your high-level protocol provides its own flow control (for example, acknowledging received messages) or the amount of data exchanged is small. {active, false} mode, use of the {active, once} mode, or {active, N} mode with values of N appropriate for the application provides flow control. The other side cannot send faster than the receiver can read.
trans-unit.target: 仅当高级协议提供自己的流控制（例如，确认收到的消息）或交换的数据量很少时，才使用活动模式。 {active, false} 模式，使用 {active, once} 模式或 {active, N} 模式（具有适用于应用程序的 N 值）提供流量控制。另一端的发送速度不能超过接收器的读取速度。

trans-unit.source: Use batch file etop.bat, for example, etop -node tiger@durin.
trans-unit.target: 使用批处理文件 etop.bat ，例如 etop -node tiger@durin node tiger @ durin。

trans-unit.source: Use bitwise AND to test for specific bits in the return value. New significant bits may be added in future releases to give more detailed information for both failed and successful calls. Do NOT use equality tests like ==, as that may cause your application to stop working.
trans-unit.target: 使用按位与测试返回值中的特定位。将来的发行版中可能会添加新的有效位，以提供有关失败和成功调用的更多详细信息。不要使用 == 之类的相等测试，因为这可能会导致您的应用程序停止运行。

trans-unit.source: Use function mnesia:table_info(Tab, wild_pattern) to obtain a basic pattern, which matches all records in a table, or use the default value in record creation. Do not make the pattern hard-coded, as this makes the code more vulnerable to future changes of the record definition.
trans-unit.target: 使用函数 mnesia:table_info(Tab, wild_pattern) 获得一个基本模式，该模式与表中的所有记录匹配，或者在记录创建中使用默认值。不要对模式进行硬编码，因为这会使代码更容易受到记录定义的将来更改的影响。

trans-unit.source: Use function rb:list() to list all loaded reports:
trans-unit.target: 使用函数 rb:list() 列出所有已加载的报告：

trans-unit.source: Use function rb:show(Number) to show details of a specific report:
trans-unit.target: 使用功能 rb:show(Number) 显示特定报告的详细信息：

trans-unit.source: Use function rb:stop() to stop the rb_server:
trans-unit.target: 使用函数 rb:stop() 停止 rb_server ：

trans-unit.source: Use function dist_util:strict_order_flags/0 to get all flags for features that require strict order delivery.
trans-unit.target: 使用函数 dist_util:strict_order_flags/0 可以获取需要严格下单的功能的所有标志。

trans-unit.source: Use its graphical interface to investigate the state of the current test case.
trans-unit.target: 使用其图形界面来调查当前测试用例的状态。

trans-unit.source: Use maps instead of records to represent the SEQUENCE and SET types. No .hrl files will be generated. See the Section Map representation for SEQUENCE and SET for more information.
trans-unit.target: 使用映射而不是记录来表示 SEQUENCE 和 SET 类型。没有将生成 .hrl 文件。有关更多信息，请参见 Map representation for SEQUENCE and SET 的截面图表示。

trans-unit.target: 在上面的脚本中使用 killproc 过程可以与对 erl_call 的调用结合使用，例如：

trans-unit.target: 使用以下两个功能之一来接收信息。

trans-unit.target: 使用以下两个功能之一发送消息。

trans-unit.source: Use option -I to name directories to be searched for application files (equivalent to the path in the option list for systools:make_script/2).
trans-unit.target: 使用选项 -I 可以为要搜索应用程序文件的目录命名（相当于 systools:make_script/2 的选项列表中的 path ）。

trans-unit.source: Use option -I with the name of a file to use that file as a customized prologue file (option includefile).
trans-unit.target: 将选项 -I 与文件名一起使用，以将该文件用作定制的序言文件（选项 includefile ）。

trans-unit.source: Use option strong_validation to generate all warnings that the compiler would generate.
trans-unit.target: 使用选项 strong_validation 生成编译器将生成的所有警告。

trans-unit.source: Use relaxed command checking only on systems with very limited interactive usage.
trans-unit.target: 仅在交互式使用非常有限的系统上使用放松的命令检查。

trans-unit.source: Use script etop.
trans-unit.target: 使用脚本 etop 。

trans-unit.source: Use selective decode instead of exclusive decode if you are interested in only a single subvalue.
trans-unit.target: 如果您只对单个子值感兴趣,请使用选择性解码而不是独占性解码。

trans-unit.source: Use the SEND_SENDERcontrol message instead of the SEND control message and use the SEND_SENDER_TT control message instead of the SEND_TT control message.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SEND_SENDER control message 代替 SEND 控制消息，并使用 SEND_SENDER_TT 控制消息代替 SEND_TT 控制消息。

trans-unit.source: Use the bin_opt_info option to have the compiler print a lot of information about binary optimizations. It can be given either to the compiler or erlc:
trans-unit.target: 使用 bin_opt_info 选项可使编译器打印许多有关二进制优化的信息。可以将其提供给编译器或 erlc ：

trans-unit.source: Use the file module for files opened for bytewise access ({encoding,latin1}).
trans-unit.target: 将 file 模块用于为按字节访问而打开的文件（ {encoding,latin1} ）。

trans-unit.source: Use the io module when accessing files with any other encoding (for example {encoding,uf8}).
trans-unit.target: 使用任何其他编码（例如 {encoding,uf8} ）访问文件时，请使用 io 模块。

trans-unit.source: Use the GUI.
trans-unit.target: 使用图形用户界面。

trans-unit.target: 使用以下命令从MIB中生成一个.hrl文件。

trans-unit.target: 使用下面的include指令来获得对以下章节中描述的记录和常量的访问。

trans-unit.source: Use the function mnesia:change_table_frag/2 to add new fragments and apply the usual schema manipulation functions (such as mnesia:add_table_copy/3, mnesia:del_table_copy/2, and mnesia:change_table_copy_type/2) on each fragment to perform the actual redistribution.
trans-unit.target: 使用函数 mnesia:change_table_frag/2 来添加新的片段，并在每个片段上应用常规的模式操作功能（例如 mnesia:add_table_copy/3 ， mnesia:del_table_copy/2 和 mnesia:change_table_copy_type/2 ）以执行实际的重新分配。

trans-unit.source: Use the function describe_table/[2,3] to find out which ODBC data type that is expected for each column of that table. If a column has a data type that is described with capital letters, alas it is not currently supported by the param_query function. Too know which Erlang data type corresponds to an ODBC data type see the Erlang to ODBC data type mapping in the User's Guide.
trans-unit.target: 使用函数describe_table / [2,3]找出该表的每一列都需要哪种ODBC数据类型。如果列的数据类型用大写字母描述，那么param_query函数当前不支持该列。太了解哪种Erlang数据类型对应于ODBC数据类型，请参阅《用户指南》中的Erlang到ODBC数据类型 mapping 。

trans-unit.source: Use the functional API with a non-constant seed:
trans-unit.target: 使用非恒定种子的功能API。

trans-unit.source: Use the map in the ssl key option:
trans-unit.target: 在ssl密钥选项中使用地图。

trans-unit.source: Use the same Erlang types to represent BIT STRING and OCTET STRING as in OTP R16.
trans-unit.target: 使用与OTP R16中相同的Erlang类型表示 BIT STRING 和 OCTET STRING 。

trans-unit.source: Use the socket option {packet, N} (or something similar) to make it possible for the receiver to close the connection when it knowns it has received all the data.
trans-unit.target: 使用套接字选项 {packet, N} （或类似的选项）可以使接收器在知道已接收到所有数据时关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: Use the specified PLT as the initial PLT. If the PLT was built during setup, the files are checked for consistency.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的PLT作为初始PLT。如果PLT是在设置过程中建立的,则会检查文件的一致性。

trans-unit.source: Use the value returned from erlang:unique_integer/0 to create a name unique on the current runtime system instance. If you only want positive integers, you can use erlang:unique_integer([positive]).
trans-unit.target: 使用从 erlang:unique_integer/0 返回的值在当前运行时系统实例上创建唯一的名称。如果只需要正整数，则可以使用 erlang:unique_integer([positive]) 。

trans-unit.source: Use the values returned from erlang:now/0 to create a name unique on the current runtime system instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用从 erlang:now/0 返回的值在当前运行时系统实例上创建唯一的名称。

trans-unit.source: Use this function after a failed system call. The message provided by the caller is printed followed by a string describing the reason for failure, and the process terminates with exit value 1. This function does not return.
trans-unit.target: 失败的系统调用后使用此功能。打印出由调用方提供的消息，后跟描述失败原因的字符串，并且该过程以退出值 1 终止。此函数不返回。

trans-unit.source: Use this function after a failed system call. The message provided by the caller is printed followed by a string describing the reason for failure.
trans-unit.target: 在系统调用失败后使用此函数。打印调用者提供的信息,后面是一个描述失败原因的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use this function only if you know what you are doing, that is, on your own applications. It is very application-dependent and configuration parameter-dependent when and how often the value is read by the application. Careless use of this function can put the application in a weird, inconsistent, and malfunctioning state.
trans-unit.target: 只有在你知道自己在做什么的情况下,也就是在你自己的应用程序上,才能使用这个函数。它的值何时以及多久被应用程序读取一次,非常依赖于应用程序和配置参数。不小心使用这个函数会使应用程序处于一种奇怪的、不一致的、失灵的状态。

trans-unit.source: Use this function to "forget" a specific match specification saved during calls to tp/2.
trans-unit.target: 使用此函数可以“忘记”在调用 tp/2 期间保存的特定匹配规范。

trans-unit.source: Use this function to "forget" all match specifications saved during calls to tp/2. This is useful when one wants to restore other match specifications from a file with rtp/1. Use dtp/1 to delete specific saved match specifications.
trans-unit.target: 使用此功能可以“忘记”在调用 tp/2 期间保存的所有匹配规范。当要从 rtp/1 的文件中恢复其他匹配规范时，此功能很有用。使用 dtp/1 删除特定的已保存匹配规范。

trans-unit.source: Use this function to recall all match specifications previously used in the session (i. e. previously saved during calls to tp/2, and built-in match specifications. This is very useful, as a complicated match_spec can be quite awkward to write. Note that the match specifications are lost if stop/0 is called.
trans-unit.target: 使用此函数可以调用会话中先前使用的所有匹配规范（即，先前在调用 tp/2 时保存的匹配规范以及内置的匹配规范。这非常有用，因为编写复杂的match_spec可能很麻烦。如果调用 stop/0 ,则匹配规范将丢失。

trans-unit.source: Use this function to set, or modify, the verbosity level for a logging category. See the User's Guide for details. Use the value default to set the general verbosity level.
trans-unit.target: 使用此功能可以设置或修改日志记录类别的详细级别。有关详细信息，请参见《 User's Guide 》。使用 default 可设置一般详细程度。

trans-unit.source: Use this function when a fatal error has occurred that is not because of a system call. The message provided by the caller is printed and the process terminates with exit value 1. This function does not return.
trans-unit.target: 发生并非由于系统调用引起的致命错误时，请使用此功能。打印出呼叫者提供的消息，并且过程以退出值 1 终止。此函数不返回。

trans-unit.source: Use this function with extreme caution, as it makes existing persistent data obsolete. Think twice before using it.
trans-unit.target: 使用此功能时要非常谨慎,因为它会使现有的持久性数据过时。使用前请三思。

trans-unit.source: Use this module to set up Telnet connections, send commands, and perform string matching on the result. For information about how to use ct_telnet and configure connections, specifically for UNIX hosts, see the unix_telnet manual page.
trans-unit.target: 使用此模块可以设置Telnet连接，发送命令以及对结果进行字符串匹配。有关如何使用 ct_telnet 和配置连接（特别是针对UNIX主机）的信息，请参见 unix_telnet 手册页。

trans-unit.source: Use this option when receiving binaries from an untrusted source.
trans-unit.target: 当从不信任的源头接收二进制文件时,请使用此选项。

trans-unit.source: Use with extreme care.
trans-unit.target: 使用时要特别小心。

trans-unit.source: Used BIFs. B is empty if builtins is false for all analyzed modules.
trans-unit.target: 使用的BIF。如果所有分析模块的 builtins 函数均为 false ，则 B 为空。

trans-unit.source: Used Library Modules.
trans-unit.target: 二手图书馆模块。

trans-unit.source: Used by enif_system_info to return information about the runtime system. Contains the same content as ErlDrvSysInfo.
trans-unit.target: 由 enif_system_info 用于返回有关运行时系统的信息。包含与 ErlDrvSysInfo 相同的内容。

trans-unit.source: Used by a process to redefine the error handler for undefined function calls and undefined registered processes. Inexperienced users are not to use this flag, as code auto-loading depends on the correct operation of the error handling module.
trans-unit.target: 由进程使用,为未定义的函数调用和未定义的注册进程重新定义错误处理程序。没有经验的用户不要使用这个标志,因为代码自动加载取决于错误处理模块的正确操作。

trans-unit.source: Used by a server process to accept a connection from a client process.
trans-unit.target: 由服务器进程使用,接受来自客户端进程的连接。

trans-unit.source: Used by a server process to register with the local name server EPMD, thereby allowing other processes to send messages by using the registered name. Before calling either of these functions, the process should have called bind() and listen() on an open socket.
trans-unit.target: 服务器进程使用它来注册本地名称服务器EPMD，从而允许其他进程使用注册的名称来发送消息。在调用这两个函数之前，进程应在打开的套接字上调用 bind() 和 listen() 。

trans-unit.source: Used in a bit string construction, Size is an expression that is to evaluate to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 在位字符串构造中使用的 Size 是一个要计算为整数的表达式。

trans-unit.source: Used in a bit string construction, Value is an expression that is to evaluate to an integer, float, or bit string. If the expression is not a single literal or variable, it is to be enclosed in parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 在位字符串构造中使用， Value 是一个表达式，可以求值为整数，浮点数或位字符串。如果表达式不是单个文字或变量，则将其括在括号中。

trans-unit.source: Used in a bit string matching, Size must be an integer, or a variable bound to an integer.
trans-unit.target: 用于位字符串匹配时， Size 必须是整数，或者是绑定到整数的变量。

trans-unit.source: Used in a bit string matching, Value must be a variable, or an integer, float, or string.
trans-unit.target: 在用于位字符串匹配时， Value 必须是变量，或者是整数，浮点数或字符串。

trans-unit.source: Used in socket close message.
trans-unit.target: 用于套接字关闭信息中。

trans-unit.source: Used in socket data message.
trans-unit.target: 用于套接字数据信息中。

trans-unit.source: Used to perform codec measurements. That is, to see what kind of performance can be expected by the different codecs provided by the megaco application.
trans-unit.target: 用于进行编解码器测量。也就是看megaco应用程序提供的不同编解码器的预期性能。

trans-unit.source: Used to set tracing on the distribution. The levels are different verbosity levels. A higher level means more information. See also section Debug Information.
trans-unit.target: 用于在分布上设置跟踪。级别是不同的详细级别。更高的级别意味着更多的信息。另请参见“ Debug Information 部分。

trans-unit.source: Used together with bind_address and port to uniquely identify a HTTP server. This can be useful in a virtualized environment, where there can be more that one server that has the same bind_address and port. If this property is not explicitly set, it is assumed that the bind_address and portuniquely identifies the HTTP server.
trans-unit.target: 与 bind_address 和 port 一起使用，以唯一地标识HTTP服务器。这在虚拟化环境中很有用，在虚拟化环境中，可能有一个以上具有相同bind_address和端口的服务器。如果未显式设置此属性，则假定 bind_address 和 port 唯一标识HTTP服务器。

trans-unit.source: Used together with ip-address and port to uniquely identify a ssh daemon. This can be useful in a virtualized environment, where there can be more that one server that has the same ip-address and port. If this property is not explicitly set, it is assumed that the the ip-address and port uniquely identifies the SSH daemon.
trans-unit.target: 与 ip-address 和 port 一起使用以唯一地标识ssh守护程序。这在虚拟化环境中很有用，在虚拟化环境中，可能有多个服务器具有相同的 ip-address 和 port 。如果未显式设置此属性，则假定 ip-address 和 port 唯一标识SSH守护程序。

trans-unit.source: Used together with send_timeout to specify whether the socket is to be automatically closed when the send operation returns {error,timeout}. The recommended setting is true, which automatically closes the socket. Defaults to false because of backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 与 send_timeout 一起使用，以指定当send操作返回 {error,timeout} 时是否自动关闭套接字。推荐的设置为 true ，它将自动关闭套接字。由于向后兼容，默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Used together with {verify, verify_peer} by an TLS/DTLS server. If set to true, the server fails if the client does not have a certificate to send, that is, sends an empty certificate. If set to false, it fails only if the client sends an invalid certificate (an empty certificate is considered valid). Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: TLS / DTLS服务器与 {verify, verify_peer} 一起使用。如果设置为 true ，则如果客户端没有要发送的证书（即发送空证书），则服务器将失败。如果设置为 false ，则仅当客户端发送无效证书（空证书被视为有效）时，它才会失败。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: Used when a process From has called seq_trace:print(Label, TraceInfo) and has a trace token with flag print set to true, and label set to Label.
trans-unit.target: 当进程 From 调用 seq_trace:print(Label, TraceInfo) 并具有将标记 print 设置为 true 并将 label 设置为 Label 的跟踪令牌时使用。

trans-unit.source: Used when a process From with its trace token flag print set to true has sent a message.
trans-unit.target: 当进程 From 的跟踪令牌标志 print 设置为 true 时，发送此消息时使用。

trans-unit.source: Used when a process To receives a message with a trace token that has flag 'receive' set to true.
trans-unit.target: 使用时，一个进程 To 接收带着一丝消息令牌具有标志 'receive' 设置为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Used when a restart of the emulator is required after all other upgrade instructions are executed. For more information about this instruction, see restart_emulator (Low-Level) in Release Handling Instructions.
trans-unit.target: 在执行所有其他升级指令后需要重新启动仿真器时使用。有关此指令的更多信息，请参见《 Release Handling Instructions restart_emulator（低级）。

trans-unit.source: Used when connection is up.
trans-unit.target: 连接时使用。

trans-unit.source: Used with the call trace flag. {M, F, Arity} is specified instead of {M, F, Args} in call trace messages.
trans-unit.target: 与 call 跟踪标志一起使用。在呼叫跟踪消息中指定了 {M, F, Arity} 而不是 {M, F, Args} 。

trans-unit.source: Used with the call trace flag. The call, return_from, and return_to trace messages are inhibited if this flag is set, but they are executed as normal if there are match specifications.
trans-unit.target: 与 call 跟踪标志一起使用。该 call ， return_from 和 return_to 如果这个标志设置跟踪消息被禁止，但如果有匹配规范他们正常执行。

trans-unit.source: Used with the call trace flag. Traces the return from a traced function back to its caller. Only works for functions traced with option local to erlang:trace_pattern/3.
trans-unit.target: 与 call 跟踪标志一起使用。跟踪从跟踪函数返回到其调用方的返回。仅适用于与选项追踪功能， local 到 erlang:trace_pattern/3 。

trans-unit.source: Useful for debugging. Prints the arguments sent to the emulator.
trans-unit.target: 对调试有用。打印发送到仿真器的参数。

trans-unit.source: Useful only for performance tuning. Do not use this option unless you know that there is problem with execution times or memory consumption, and ensure that the option improves matters.
trans-unit.target: 只对性能调整有用。除非你知道执行时间或内存消耗有问题,否则不要使用这个选项,并确保该选项能改善问题。

trans-unit.source: Useful options for the ASN.1 compiler:
trans-unit.target: ASN.1编译器的有用选项。

trans-unit.source: User Authentication (using Mnesia, Dets or plain text database)
trans-unit.target: 用户认证(使用Mnesia、Dets或纯文本数据库)

trans-unit.source: User authentication using text files, Dets, or Mnesia database.
trans-unit.target: 使用文本文件、Dets或Mnesia数据库进行用户认证。

trans-unit.source: User does not have privileges to create symbolic links (SeCreateSymbolicLinkPrivilege on Windows).
trans-unit.target: 用户没有创建符号链接的特权（Windows上为 SeCreateSymbolicLinkPrivilege ）。

trans-unit.source: User info - Information related to megaco users. Read/Write.
trans-unit.target: 用户信息-与megaco用户相关的信息。读/写。

trans-unit.source: User is not logged in.
trans-unit.target: 用户未登录。

trans-unit.source: User login information
trans-unit.target: 用户登录信息

trans-unit.source: User owning the public key.
trans-unit.target: 拥有公钥的用户。

trans-unit.source: User's private key(s)
trans-unit.target: 用户的私钥

trans-unit.source: User's public key
trans-unit.target: 用户的公钥

trans-unit.source: User-Name AVP
trans-unit.target: 用户名称AVP

trans-unit.source: User-defined entries can also be written to a configuration file by calling function ttb:write_config(ConfigFile,ConfigList), where ConfigList is a list of {Module,Function,Args}.
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的条目也可以通过调用函数 ttb:write_config(ConfigFile,ConfigList) 写入配置文件，其中 ConfigList 是 {Module,Function,Args} 的列表。

trans-unit.source: User-defined event handlers can be added to handle application-specific events.
trans-unit.target: 可以添加用户自定义的事件处理程序来处理应用程序的特定事件。

trans-unit.source: User-specific data for use in hook functions. The default value is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 在挂钩函数中使用的用户特定数据。默认值为 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: User-specific event handlers can be plugged into a Common Test event manager, either by telling Common Test to install them before the test run (described later), or by adding the handlers dynamically during the test run using gen_event:add_handler/3 or gen_event:add_sup_handler/3. In the latter scenario, the reference of the Common Test event manager is required. To get it, call ct:get_event_mgr_ref/0 or (on the Common Test Master node) ct_master:get_event_mgr_ref/0.
trans-unit.target: 用户特定的事件处理程序可以插入 Common Test 事件管理器中，方法是告诉 Common Test 在测试运行之前安装它们（稍后描述），或者通过使用 gen_event:add_handler/3 或 gen_event:add_sup_handler/3 在测试运行期间动态添加处理程序：add_sup_handler / 3。在后一种情况下，需要 Common Test 事件管理器的引用。要获取它，请调用 ct:get_event_mgr_ref/0 或（在 Common Test Master节点上） ct_master:get_event_mgr_ref/0 。

trans-unit.source: UserMod:handle_connect/2
trans-unit.target: UserMod:handle_connect/2

trans-unit.source: UserMod:handle_message_error/3
trans-unit.target: UserMod:handle_message_error/3

trans-unit.source: UserMod:handle_syntax_error/3
trans-unit.target: UserMod:handle_syntax_error/3

trans-unit.source: UserMod:handle_trans_ack/4
trans-unit.target: UserMod:handle_trans_ack/4

trans-unit.source: UserMod:handle_trans_reply/4
trans-unit.target: UserMod:handle_trans_reply/4

trans-unit.source: UserMod:handle_trans_request/3
trans-unit.target: UserMod:handle_trans_request/3

trans-unit.source: Users are advised not to unregister system processes.
trans-unit.target: 建议用户不要取消注册系统进程。

trans-unit.source: Users are not allowed to define types with the same names as the predefined or built-in ones. This is checked by the compiler and its violation results in a compilation error.
trans-unit.target: 用户不允许定义与预定义或内置类型名称相同的类型。编译器会对此进行检查,违反规定会导致编译错误。

trans-unit.source: Users may either explicitly be registered with megaco:start_user/2 and/or be statically configured by setting the application environment variable 'users' to a list of {UserMid, Config} tuples. See the function megaco:start_user/2 for details.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以通过megaco:start_user/2显式注册和/或通过将应用程序环境变量'users'设置为{UserMid,Config}元组列表来静态配置。详见函数megaco:start_user/2。

trans-unit.source: Uses a separate log file for every invocation of the service (<servicename>.debug.<N>).
trans-unit.target: 对服务的每次调用使用单独的日志文件（<servicename> .debug. <N>）。

trans-unit.source: Uses a sequence of wrap log files of limited size. As a wrap log file is filled up, further items are logged on to the next file in the sequence, starting all over with the first file when the last file is filled up.
trans-unit.target: 使用一个有限大小的缠绕日志文件序列,当一个缠绕日志文件被填满时,更多的项目将被记录到序列中的下一个文件中,当最后一个文件被填满时,将从第一个文件开始。当一个wrap日志文件被填满时,更多的项目将被记录到序列中的下一个文件中,当最后一个文件被填满时,将从第一个文件开始。

trans-unit.source: Uses a specific or customised prologue file instead of default lib/parsetools/include/leexinc.hrl which is otherwise included.
trans-unit.target: 使用特定或自定义的序言文件，而不使用默认的 lib/parsetools/include/leexinc.hrl ，否则该文件将包含在内。

trans-unit.source: Uses an ErrorDescriptor and returns a deep list of characters that describes the error. This function is usually called implicitly when an ErrorInfo structure (described in section Error Information) is processed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ErrorDescriptor 并返回描述错误的深层字符列表。处理 ErrorInfo 结构（在 Error Information 部分中描述）时，通常隐式调用此函数。

trans-unit.source: Uses an ErrorDescriptor and returns a string that describes the error or warning. This function is usually called implicitly when an ErrorInfo structure is processed (see section Error Information).
trans-unit.target: 使用 ErrorDescriptor 并返回描述错误或警告的字符串。处理 ErrorInfo 结构时，通常会隐式调用此函数（请参见 Error Information 一节）。

trans-unit.source: Uses an ErrorDescriptor and returns a string that describes the error. This function is usually called implicitly when an ErrorInfo structure is processed (see section Error Information).
trans-unit.target: 使用 ErrorDescriptor 并返回描述错误的字符串。处理 ErrorInfo 结构时，通常会隐式调用此函数（请参见 Error Information 一节）。

trans-unit.source: Uses test specification as input (described later).
trans-unit.target: 使用测试规范作为输入(后面会提到)。

trans-unit.source: Uses the Pseudo-Random Function (PRF) of a TLS session to generate extra key material. It either takes user-generated values for Secret and Seed or atoms directing it to use a specific value from the session security parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用TLS会话的伪随机函数（PRF）生成额外的密钥材料。它要么使用用户生成的 Secret 和 Seed 值，要么使用原子来指示它使用会话安全性参数中的特定值。

trans-unit.source: Uses the following Erlang Web Server API interaction data:
trans-unit.target: 使用以下Erlang Web Server API交互数据。

trans-unit.source: Uses the following Erlang web server API interaction data:
trans-unit.target: 使用以下Erlang web服务器API交互数据。

trans-unit.source: Uses the return value of command N in the current command, if N is positive. If it is negative, the return value of the Nth previous command is used (that is, v(-1) uses the value of the previous command).
trans-unit.target: 如果 N 为正，则使用当前命令中命令 N 的返回值。如果为负，则使用第 N 个前一个命令的返回值（即 v(-1) 使用前一个命令的值）。

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified directory as current directory. It is prepended to filenames when extracting them from the zip archive. (Acting like file:set_cwd/1 in Kernel, but without changing the global cwd property.)
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目录作为当前目录。从zip归档文件中提取文件名时，会将其添加到文件名之前。（其作用类似于内核中的 file:set_cwd/1 ，但未更改全局 cwd 属性。）

trans-unit.source: Uses the specified directory as current work directory (cwd). This is prepended to filenames when adding them, although not in the zip archive (acting like file:set_cwd/1 in Kernel, but without changing the global cwd property.).
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目录作为当前工作目录（ cwd ）。添加文件名时，这是文件名的前缀，尽管不在zip归档文件中（其作用类似于内核中的 file:set_cwd/1 ，但未更改全局 cwd 属性。）。

trans-unit.source: Using -group top1 top2, or {group,[top1,top2]} gives the same result.
trans-unit.target: 使用 -group top1 top2 或 {group,[top1,top2]} 可以得到相同的结果。

trans-unit.source: Using -include_lib("syntax_tools/include/merl.hrl"). enables this transform, unless the macro MERL_NO_TRANSFORM is defined first.
trans-unit.target: 使用 -include_lib("syntax_tools/include/merl.hrl"). 启用此转换，除非首先定义了宏 MERL_NO_TRANSFORM 。

trans-unit.source: Using ets:select/2 and a match specification, one can filter out rows of a table and construct a list of tuples containing relevant parts of the data in these rows. One can use ets:foldl/3 instead, but the ets:select/2 call is far more efficient. Without the translation provided by ms_transform, one must struggle with writing match specifications terms to accommodate this.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ets:select/2 和match规范，可以过滤出表中的行，并构造一个包含这些行中数据相关部分的元组列表。可以改用 ets:foldl/3 ，但是 ets:select/2 调用效率更高。如果没有 ms_transform 提供的翻译，则必须努力编写匹配规范术语来适应这一要求。

trans-unit.source: Using cprof:analyse() in this example also shows approximately the same background work as in the first example.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中使用 cprof:analyse() 还显示了与第一个示例大致相同的背景工作。

trans-unit.source: Using ct_run -step [opts], or by passing option {step,Opts} to ct:run_test/1, the following is possible:
trans-unit.target: 使用 ct_run -step [opts] 或通过将选项 {step,Opts} ct:run_test/1 }传递给ct：run_test / 1，可以进行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Using erl_drv_output_term() or erl_drv_send_term(), a binary can be included in an Erlang term.
trans-unit.target: 使用 erl_drv_output_term() 或 erl_drv_send_term() ，可以在Erlang术语中包含二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: Using ets:fun2ms/1, we can combine the ease of use of the ets:foldr/3 and the efficiency of the pure ets:select/2 example:
trans-unit.target: 使用 ets:fun2ms/1 ，我们可以将 ets:foldr/3 的易用性与纯 ets:select/2 的效率结合起来：

trans-unit.source: Using list_to_atom/1 to construct an atom that is passed to apply/3 as follows, is quite expensive and not recommended in time-critical code:
trans-unit.target: 使用 list_to_atom/1 构造一个传递给 apply/3 的原子，如下所示，它非常昂贵，因此在时间紧迫的代码中不建议使用：

trans-unit.source: Using scheduler_wall_time to calculate scheduler utilization:
trans-unit.target: 使用 scheduler_wall_time 计算调度程序利用率：

trans-unit.source: Using {beast_mitigation, disabled} makes SSL or TLS vulnerable to the BEAST attack.

trans-unit.target: 使用Mnesia函数

trans-unit.target: 将Mnesia表用作SNMP表

trans-unit.source: Using QLC
trans-unit.target: 使用QLC

trans-unit.source: Using QLC can be more expensive than using Mnesia functions directly but offers a nice syntax.
trans-unit.target: 与直接使用 Mnesia 函数相比，使用QLC可能会更昂贵，但提供了一种不错的语法。

trans-unit.source: Using a msg_env of NULL is an optimization, which groups together calls to enif_alloc_env, enif_make_copy, enif_port_command, and enif_free_env into one call. This optimization is only useful when a majority of the terms are to be copied from env to msg_env.
trans-unit.target: 使用 msg_env 的 NULL 是一种优化，这组一起呼吁 enif_alloc_env ， enif_make_copy ， enif_port_command 和 enif_free_env 到一个通话中。仅当将大多数术语从 env 复制到 msg_env 时，此优化才有用。

trans-unit.source: Using a bridge that maps control messages in a proprietary protocol to a standardized management protocol and conversely
trans-unit.target: 使用桥接器,将专有协议中的控制信息映射到标准化管理协议中,反之亦然

trans-unit.source: Using a configuration target name (an alias) as reference.
trans-unit.target: 使用配置目标名称(别名)作为参考。

trans-unit.source: Using a driver binary instead of a normal buffer is often faster, as the emulator needs not to copy the data, only the pointer is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用驱动二进制而不是普通的缓冲区通常会更快,因为仿真器不需要复制数据,只需要使用指针。

trans-unit.source: Using a proprietary control protocol
trans-unit.target: 使用专有控制协议

trans-unit.source: Using a pure password-based authentication scheme. Here, the plain text password is encrypted before sent over the network.
trans-unit.target: 使用纯密码认证方案。在这里,纯文本密码在通过网络发送之前被加密。

trans-unit.source: Using a trace port significantly lowers the overhead imposed by using tracing.
trans-unit.target: 使用跟踪端口大大降低了使用跟踪所带来的开销。

trans-unit.source: Using a value of Timeout less than the maximum time taken by the OS to establish an association (around 4.5 minutes if the default values from RFC 4960 are used), can result in inconsistent or incorrect return values. This is especially relevant for associations sharing the same Socket (that is, source address and port), as the controlling process blocks until connect/* returns. connect_init/* provides an alternative without this limitation.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用的 Timeout 值小于操作系统建立关联所花费的最长时间（如果使用的是 RFC 4960 的默认值，则约为4.5分钟），可能会导致返回值不一致或不正确。这对于共享同一 Socket （即源地址和端口）的关联特别重要，因为控制进程将阻塞直到 connect/* 返回。 connect_init/* 提供了一种没有此限制的替代方法。

trans-unit.source: Using behaviours also makes it easier to read and understand code written by other programmers. Improvised programming structures, while possibly more efficient, are always more difficult to understand.
trans-unit.target: 使用行为也使其他程序员编写的代码更容易阅读和理解。即兴的编程结构虽然可能更有效率,但总是更难理解。

trans-unit.source: Using binaries is faster if more than a few bytes are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果返回的字节数超过几个,使用二进制文件会更快。

trans-unit.source: Using global names
trans-unit.target: 使用全局名称

trans-unit.source: Using keyboard-interactive authentication. This is suitable for interactive authentication methods that do not need any special software support on the client side. Instead, all authentication data is entered from the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 使用键盘交互式认证。这适用于不需要客户端任何特殊软件支持的交互式认证方法。相反,所有的认证数据都是从键盘输入的。

trans-unit.source: Using one of the latter three requires good knowledge about the protocol and is not covered by this tutorial. See the SNMP, Inets, and Orber applications, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 使用后三种中的一种需要很好的协议知识,本教程不涉及。分别参见SNMP、Inets和Orber应用。

trans-unit.source: Using public key technology. RSA and DSA, X509-certificates are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 使用公钥技术。不支持RSA和DSA、X509证书。

trans-unit.target: 使用原始套接字选项需要详细了解当前操作系统和TCP协议栈。

trans-unit.source: Using transactions is a way to guarantee that the distributed Mnesia database remains consistent, even when many different processes update it in parallel. However, if you have real-time requirements it is recommended to use dirty operations instead of transactions. When using dirty operations, you lose the consistency guarantee; this is usually solved by only letting one process update the table. Other processes must send update requests to that process.
trans-unit.target: 使用事务是一种保证分布式Mnesia数据库保持一致的方法，即使许多不同的进程并行更新它也是如此。但是，如果您有实时要求，建议使用 dirty 操作而不是事务。使用 dirty 操作时，您会失去一致性保证；这通常可以通过只允许一个进程更新表来解决。其他进程必须将更新请求发送到该进程。

trans-unit.target: 通常几个经理和很多代理商沟通。

trans-unit.source: Usually it suffices to detect time-outs on receive, as most protocols include some sort of acknowledgment from the server, but if the protocol is strictly one way, option send_timeout comes in handy.
trans-unit.target: 通常，检测接收到的超时就足够了，因为大多数协议都包括来自服务器的某种确认，但是如果协议严格来说是一种方式，则可以使用 send_timeout 选项。

trans-unit.source: Usually one of "System", "Application" or "Security". Note that the NT eventlog viewer has another notion of category, which in most cases is totally meaningless and therefore not imported into Erlang. What is called a category here is one of the main three types of events occurring in a normal NT system.
trans-unit.target: 通常是 "System" ， "Application" 或 "Security" 。请注意，NT事件日志查看器还有另一个类别概念，在大多数情况下，该类别完全没有意义，因此不会导入到Erlang中。这里所谓的类别是正常NT系统中发生的三种主要事件之一。

trans-unit.source: Usually, the entities defined in the MIB are called Managed Objects (MOs), although they do not have to be objects in the object-oriented way. For example, a simple scalar variable defined in a MIB is called an MO. The MOs are logical objects, not necessarily with a one-to-one mapping to the resources.
trans-unit.target: 通常，在MIB中定义的实体称为托管对象（MO），尽管它们不一定是面向对象的对象。例如，在MIB中定义的简单标量变量称为MO。MO是逻辑对象，不一定具有与资源的一对一映射。

trans-unit.source: Variable A is bound to the evaluated value of the list comprehension ([1,2]). The compiler complains with an error message ("argument is not a query list comprehension"); the shell process stops with a badarg reason.

trans-unit.source: Variable bindings, and local process dictionary changes that are generated in user expressions are preserved, and the variables can be used in later commands to access their values. The bindings can also be forgotten so the variables can be reused.
trans-unit.target: 变量绑定,以及在用户表达式中产生的本地进程字典变化都会被保存下来,变量可以在以后的命令中使用,以访问它们的值。绑定也可以被遗忘,这样变量就可以被重复使用。

trans-unit.source: Variable key length from 32 bits up to 448 bits
trans-unit.target: 密钥长度可从32位到448位不等。

trans-unit.source: Variable key length from 8 bits up to 2048 bits (usually between 40 and 256)
trans-unit.target: 可变的密钥长度从8位到2048位(通常在40和256位之间)。

trans-unit.source: Variables are bound to values through the pattern matching mechanism. Pattern matching occurs when evaluating a function call, case- receive- try- expressions and match operator (=) expressions.
trans-unit.target: 变量通过模式匹配机制绑定到值。模式匹配在评估函数调用（ case - receive - try -表达式和匹配运算符（=）表达式）时发生。

trans-unit.source: Variables are bound to values using pattern matching. Erlang uses single assignment, that is, a variable can only be bound once.
trans-unit.target: 使用 pattern matching 将变量绑定到值。Erlang使用单一分配，即一个变量只能绑定一次。

trans-unit.target: 变量不能从fun中导出。

trans-unit.source: Variables cannot be exported from a list comprehension.

trans-unit.source: Variables in a fun head shadow the function name and both shadow variables in the function clause surrounding the fun expression. Variables bound in a fun body are local to the fun body.
trans-unit.target: 趣头中的变量会对函数名和函数子句中围绕趣表达式的两个影子变量产生影子。绑定在fun体中的变量是fun体的局部变量。

trans-unit.source: Variables in this section are only used, when configuring Erlang/OTP for cross compilation using $ERL_TOP/otp_build configure.
trans-unit.target: 仅当使用 $ERL_TOP/otp_build configure 配置Erlang / OTP进行交叉编译时，才使用本节中的变量。

trans-unit.source: Variables occurring in the head of the fun are replaced by match specification variables in the order of occurrence, so that fragment fun({A,B,C}) is replaced by {'$1', '$2', '$3'}, and so on. Every occurrence of such a variable in the match specification is replaced by a match specification variable in the same way, so that the fun fun({A,B}) when is_atom(A) -> B end is translated into [{{'$1','$2'},[{is_atom,'$1'}],['$2']}].
trans-unit.target: fun开头出现的变量按匹配顺序按出现的顺序替换，因此片段 fun({A,B,C}) 替换为 {'$1', '$2', '$3'} ，等等。匹配规范中每次出现的此类变量都以相同的方式替换为匹配规范变量，以便将 fun({A,B}) when is_atom(A) -> B end 转换为 [{{'$1','$2'},[{is_atom,'$1'}],['$2']}] 。

trans-unit.source: Variables of type ERL_NIF_TERM can refer to any Erlang term. This is an opaque type and values of it can only by used either as arguments to API functions or as return values from NIFs. All ERL_NIF_TERMs belong to an environment (ErlNifEnv). A term cannot be destructed individually, it is valid until its environment is destructed.
trans-unit.target: ERL_NIF_TERM 类型的变量可以引用任何Erlang术语。这是一种不透明类型，其值只能用作API函数的参数或用作NIF的返回值。所有 ERL_NIF_TERM s时对应的环境（ ErlNifEnv ）。术语不能被单独破坏，它在其环境被破坏之前是有效的。

trans-unit.source: Variables shadowed in funs and list comprehensions
trans-unit.target: 变量在funs和列表理解中的影子。

trans-unit.source: Variables start with an uppercase letter or underscore (_). Variables can contain alphanumeric characters, underscore and @.
trans-unit.target: 变量以大写字母或下划线（_）开头。变量可以包含字母数字字符，下划线和 @ 。

trans-unit.source: Variables starting with _@, for example _@bar or _@Bar
trans-unit.target: 以 _@ 开头的变量，例如 _@bar 或 _@Bar

trans-unit.source: Variables starting with underscore (_), for example, _Height, are normal variables, not anonymous. They are however ignored by the compiler in the sense that they do not generate any warnings for unused variables.
trans-unit.target: 以下划线（_）开头的变量，例如 _Height ，是普通变量，不是匿名变量。但是，它们不会对未使用的变量生成任何警告，因此编译器会忽略它们。

trans-unit.source: Variables take the form '$<number>', where <number> is an integer between 0 and 100,000,000 (1e+8). The behavior if the number is outside these limits is undefined. In the MatchHead part, the special variable '_' matches anything, and never gets bound (like _ in Erlang).
trans-unit.target: 变量采用 '$<number>' 的形式，其中 <number> 是0到100,000,000（1e + 8）之间的整数。如果数字超出这些限制，则行为是不确定的。在 MatchHead 部分中，特殊变量 '_' 匹配任何内容，并且永远不会被绑定（如Erlang中的 _ ）。

trans-unit.source: Variables that are defined before the fun, and that occur in function calls or guard tests within the fun, have the values they had outside the fun.
trans-unit.target: 在fun之前定义的变量,以及在fun中的函数调用或防护测试中出现的变量,其值在fun之外。

trans-unit.source: Waits on a condition variable. The calling thread is blocked until another thread wakes it by signaling or broadcasting on the condition variable. Before the calling thread is blocked, it unlocks the mutex passed as argument. When the calling thread is woken, it locks the same mutex before returning. That is, the mutex currently must be locked by the calling thread when calling this function.
trans-unit.target: 在条件变量上等待。调用线程被阻塞,直到另一个线程通过信号或广播条件变量来唤醒它。在调用线程被阻塞之前,它解锁作为参数传递的mutex。当调用线程被唤醒时,它在返回之前锁定相同的mutex。也就是说,当调用这个函数时,mutex当前必须被调用线程锁定。

trans-unit.source: Warning events were introduced in Erlang/OTP R9C and are enabled by default as from Erlang/OTP 18.0. To retain backwards compatibility with existing user-defined event handlers, the warning events can be tagged as errors or info using command-line flag +W <e | i | w>, thus showing up as ERROR REPORT or INFO REPORT in the logs.
trans-unit.target: 警告事件是在Erlang / OTP R9C中引入的，默认情况下从Erlang / OTP 18.0开始启用。为了保持与现有用户定义事件处理程序的向后兼容性，可以使用命令行标志 +W <e | i | w> 将警告事件标记为 errors 或 info 。我 w>，因此在日志中显示为 ERROR REPORT 或 INFO REPORT 。

trans-unit.source: We always strive to remain as compatible as possible even in the cases where we give no compatibility guarantees.
trans-unit.target: 即使在我们不保证兼容性的情况下,我们也会努力保持尽可能的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: We belive that the truth finally has caught with the following, retired myths.
trans-unit.target: 我们相信,真相终于抓住了以下,退役的神话。

trans-unit.source: We call a set of ordered sets (x[1], ..., x[n]) an (n-ary) relation, and say that the relation is a subset of the Cartesian product X[1] × ... × X[n], where x[i] is an element of X[i], 1 <= i <= n.
trans-unit.target: 我们称一组有序集（x [1]，...，x [n]）为（n元）关系，并且说该关系是笛卡尔积X [1]×...的子集。 ×X [n]，其中x [i]是X [i]的元素，1 <= i <= n。

trans-unit.source: We call disconnect to log out from the database. (This should have been done from Erlang, but just in case.)
trans-unit.target: 我们调用disconnect来从数据库中注销。(这应该是在Erlang中完成的,但以防万一。)

trans-unit.source: We can also start a distributed system (requires bin/epmd).
trans-unit.target: 我们还可以启动分布式系统（需要 bin/epmd ）。

trans-unit.source: We can in this example hibernate in the {open,_} state, because what normally occurs in that state is that the state time-out after a while triggers a transition to {locked,_}:
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，我们可以进入 {open,_} 状态休眠，因为通常在该状态下发生的是一段时间后状态超时触发向 {locked,_} ：

trans-unit.source: We can now continue with further analyses, or we can delete the Xref server:
trans-unit.target: 现在我们可以继续进行进一步的分析,也可以删除Xref服务器。

trans-unit.source: We continue trying to write until the queue is empty or the writing blocks.
trans-unit.target: 我们继续尝试写入,直到队列空了或者写入阻塞。

trans-unit.source: We could find the size of the closure of the module graph with a loop similar to one used for the function graph, but since the module graph is so much smaller, a more direct method is feasible.
trans-unit.target: 我们可以用类似于函数图的循环来求模块图的闭合大小,但由于模块图小得多,所以更直接的方法是可行的。

trans-unit.source: We could say that the button was pressed too early so it is not to be recognized as the lock button. Or we can make the lock button part of the state so when we then change the lock button in the locked state, the change becomes a state change and all postponed events are retried, therefore the lock is immediately locked!
trans-unit.target: 我们可以说这个按钮按得太早了,所以不能被识别为锁定按钮。或者我们可以把锁按钮变成状态的一部分,这样当我们再锁定状态下改变锁按钮时,这个改变就变成了状态的改变,所有推迟的事件都会被重试,因此锁就会立即被锁住!

trans-unit.target: 我们用以下方法创建表格。

trans-unit.target: 我们将状态定义为 {StateName,LockButton} ，其中 StateName 和以前一样，而 LockButton 是当前的锁定按钮：

trans-unit.source: We do not need a sub-agent for each table holder. Normally, the sub-agent is needed to take care of communication, but in Distributed Erlang we use ordinary message passing.
trans-unit.target: 我们不需要为每个表持有者设置一个子代理。通常情况下,需要子代理来负责通信,但在分布式Erlang中,我们使用普通的消息传递。

trans-unit.target: 我们执行查询并对结果进行编码。编码是在另一个C模块 pg_encode.c 中完成的，该模块也作为示例代码提供。

trans-unit.source: We find no particulary long suspend times, so no function seems to have waited in a receive statement. Actually, prim_file:drv_command/4 contains a receive statement, but in this test program, the message lies in the process receive buffer when the receive statement is entered. We also see that the total suspend time for the test run is small.
trans-unit.target: 我们没有特别长的挂起时间，因此似乎没有函数在接收语句中等待。实际上， prim_file:drv_command/4 包含一条接收语句，但是在此测试程序中，输入接收语句时，消息位于进程接收缓冲区中。我们还看到测试运行的总暂停时间很小。

trans-unit.source: We get all features of Mnesia, such as fault tolerance, persistent data storage, replication, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 我们得到Mnesia的所有功能,如容错、持久化数据存储、复制等。

trans-unit.source: We handle the requests for retrieving data:
trans-unit.target: 我们处理检索数据的请求。

trans-unit.source: We have a structure to store state needed by the driver, in this case we only need to keep the database connection:
trans-unit.target: 我们有一个结构来存储驱动所需要的状态,在这种情况下,我们只需要保留数据库连接。

trans-unit.source: We have included some simple tool(s) for codec measurement (meas), performance tests (mstone1 and mstone2) and message transformation.
trans-unit.target: 我们已经包含了一些简单的工具,用于编解码器测量(meas)、性能测试(mstone1和mstone2)和信息转换。

trans-unit.source: We have instrumented our code in order to enable tracing. Running the application with tracing deactivated, causes a negligible performance overhead (an external call to a function which returns an atom). Activation of tracing does not require any recompilation of the code, since we rely on Erlang/OTP's built in support for dynamic trace activation. In our case tracing of calls to a given external function.
trans-unit.target: 我们对我们的代码进行了工具化处理,以便启用跟踪功能。在停用跟踪的情况下运行应用程序,会造成可忽略的性能开销(外部调用一个返回原子的函数)。激活跟踪不需要重新编译代码,因为我们依靠的是Erlang/OTP对动态跟踪激活的内置支持。在我们的例子中,跟踪对一个给定外部函数的调用。

trans-unit.source: We have introduced the term "user" as a generic term for either an MG or an MGC, since most of the functionality we support, is common for both MG's and MGC's. A (local) user may be configured in various ways and it may establish any number of connections to its counterpart, the remote user. Once a connection has been established, the connection is supervised and it may be used for the purpose of sending messages. N.B. according to the standard an MG is connected to at most one MGC, while an MGC may be connected to any number of MG's.
trans-unit.target: 我们引入 "用户 "一词作为MG或MGC的通用术语,因为我们支持的大多数功能对MG和MGC都是通用的。一个(本地)用户可以以各种方式进行配置,并且它可以建立任何数量的连接到其对应的远程用户。一旦建立了一个连接,该连接就会受到监督,并可用于发送消息。注:根据标准,一个MG最多连接到一个MGC,而一个MGC可以连接到任何数量的MG。

trans-unit.source: We have made four different measurements of our Erlang/OTP implementation of the Megaco/H.248 protocol stack, in order to compare our different encoders/decoders. The result of each one is summarized in the table below.
trans-unit.target: 我们对我们的Erlang/OTP实现的Megaco/H.248协议栈进行了四次不同的测量,以比较我们不同的编码器/解码器。下表总结了每一项的结果。

trans-unit.source: We have sometimes experienced problems with Oracle's java running out of memory when running fop. Increasing the amount of memory available as follows has in our case solved the problem.
trans-unit.target: 在运行 fop 时，有时Oracle的 java 内存不足会遇到问题。在我们的情况下，按以下方式增加可用内存量已解决了该问题。

trans-unit.source: We include FromPid just in case we want to trace this.
trans-unit.target: 我们包括 FromPid ，以防万一我们要跟踪它。

trans-unit.source: We loop through the requests one at the time, stopping when we either encounter an error or the list is exhausted. The last return value is sent back to the client (it is first returned to the main loop and then sent back by function io_reply).
trans-unit.target: 我们一次遍历一个请求，遇到错误或列表耗尽时停止。最后的返回值发送回客户端（首先返回到主循环，然后由 io_reply 函数发送回）。

trans-unit.source: We match on the top element and embed the inner parts in an HTML body. Then we extract the string values of all motorcycle brands, sort them and removes duplicates by remove_duplicates(value_of(select("bike/name/manufacturer", E))). We also process the substructure of the top element and pass it to a function that sorts all motorcycle information by brand according to the task formulation in the beginning of this example.
trans-unit.target: 我们在顶部元素上进行匹配，并将内部部分嵌入HTML正文中。然后，我们提取所有摩托车品牌的字符串值，对其进行排序，然后通过 remove_duplicates(value_of(select("bike/name/manufacturer", E))) 删除重复项。我们还处理了顶层元素的子结构，并将其传递给一个函数，该函数根据此示例开始时的任务制定按品牌对所有摩托车信息进行排序。

trans-unit.source: We need to handle backward compatibility and the file module (which uses the old requests until backward compatibility with pre-R13 nodes is no longer needed). Notice that the I/O server does not work with a simple file:write/2 if these are not added:
trans-unit.target: 我们需要处理向后兼容性和 file 模块（它将使用旧请求，直到不再需要与R13之前的节点向后兼容为止）。请注意，如果未添加这些 file:write/2 ，则I / O服务器不能与简单的file：write / 2一起使用：

trans-unit.source: We need to handle some requests. First the requests for writing characters:
trans-unit.target: 我们需要处理一些请求。首先是写字符的请求。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using the -callback attribute rather than the behaviour_info() function. The reason is that the extra type information can be used by tools to produce documentation or find discrepancies.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议使用 -callback 属性而不是 behaviour_info() 函数。原因是工具可以使用额外的类型信息来生成文档或查找差异。

trans-unit.source: We refer to these as "automatic metavariables". If in addition the name ends with @, as in _@Foo@, the value of the variable as an Erlang term will be automatically converted to the corresponding abstract syntax tree when used to construct a larger tree. For example, in:
trans-unit.target: 我们称这些为“自动元变量”。如果名称另外以 @ 结尾，例如 _@Foo@ ，则在构造较大的树时，作为Erlang术语的变量值将自动转换为相应的抽象语法树。例如，在：

trans-unit.source: We see that file:write/2 only calls prim_file:write/2, but let us refrain from digging into the internals of the kernel application.
trans-unit.target: 我们看到 file:write/2 仅调用 prim_file:write/2 ，但让我们避免深入研究内核应用程序的内部。

trans-unit.source: We see that the new release version is permanent, so it would be safe to restart the node.
trans-unit.target: 我们看到新发行版本是 permanent 版本，因此可以安全地重新启动节点。

trans-unit.source: We simply pick out an I/O vector from the queue (which is the whole queue as a SysIOVec). If the I/O vector is too long (IO_VECTOR_MAX is defined to 16), the vector length is decreased (line 15), otherwise the writev call (line 17) fails. Writing is tried and anything written is dequeued (line 27). If the write fails with EWOULDBLOCK (notice that all sockets are in non-blocking mode), driver_select is called to make the uds_output routine be called when there is space to write again.
trans-unit.target: 我们只需从队列（作为 SysIOVec 的整个队列）中选择一个I / O向量。如果I / O向量太长（ IO_VECTOR_MAX 定义为16），则向量长度会减小（第15行），否则 writev 调用（第17行）会失败。尝试编写，将所有写出列（第27行）。如果写入失败， EWOULDBLOCK （请注意，所有插座都在非阻塞模式）， driver_select 被称为使 uds_output 当有空间写一遍程序中调用。

trans-unit.source: We specify the filter, we want to view calls that resemble ets:new(toy_table, <something>):
trans-unit.target: 我们指定过滤器，我们想查看类似于 ets:new(toy_table, <something>) 调用：

trans-unit.source: We start a simple target system as above. The only difference is that also the file releases/RELEASES is present for code replacement in runtime to work.
trans-unit.target: 我们如上所述启动一个简单的目标系统。唯一的区别在于，还存在文件 releases/RELEASES ，以便在运行时替换代码。

trans-unit.source: We start writing the example Unix domain sockets driver by declaring prototypes and filling in a static ErlDrvEntry structure:
trans-unit.target: 我们通过声明原型并填充静态 ErlDrvEntry 结构开始编写示例Unix域套接字驱动程序：

trans-unit.source: We store the creation serial number in the file. The creation is a number that is to change between different instances of different Erlang emulators with the same name, so that process identifiers from one emulator do not become valid when sent to a new emulator with the same distribution name. The creation can be from 0 through 3 (two bits) and is stored in every process identifier sent to another node.
trans-unit.target: 我们将 creation 序列号存储在文件中。该 creation 是一个数字，是将不同的Erlang模拟器具有相同名称的不同实例之间变化，所以从一个进程标识符时相同的分布名称发送到一个新的仿真模拟器不生效。创建的范围可以从0到3（两位），并存储在发送到另一个节点的每个进程标识符中。

trans-unit.source: We strongly encourage the use of the RowStatus convention for every table that can be modified from the manager, even for newly designed SNMPv1 MIBs. In SNMPv1, everybody has invented their own scheme for emulating table operations, which has led to numerous inconsistencies. The convention in SNMPv2 is flexible and powerful and has been tested successfully. If the table is read only, no RowStatus column should be used.
trans-unit.target: 我们强烈建议对可以从管理器修改的每个表使用 RowStatus 约定，即使是对于新设计的SNMPv1 MIB也是如此。在SNMPv1中，每个人都发明了自己的用于模拟表操作的方案，这导致了许多不一致之处。SNMPv2中的约定灵活而强大，并且已经成功测试。如果表是只读的，则不应使用RowStatus列。

trans-unit.source: We study the state that is needed for the ports. Notice that not all fields are used for all types of ports. Some space could be saved by using unions, but that would clutter the code with multiple indirections, so here is used one struct for all types of ports, for readability:
trans-unit.target: 我们研究端口所需要的状态。请注意,并不是所有的字段都用于所有类型的 port。使用联合体可以节省一些空间,但这样做会使代码变得杂乱无章,所以这里使用一个结构来处理所有类型的端口,以方便阅读。

trans-unit.source: We suspect the ets:new/2 call, as we match hard on the return value, but want only the particular new/2 call with toy_table as first parameter. So we start a default tracer on the node:
trans-unit.target: 我们怀疑 ets:new/2 调用，因为我们很难在返回值上进行匹配，但是只希望特定的 new/2 调用以 toy_table 作为第一个参数。因此，我们在节点上启动默认跟踪器：

trans-unit.source: We turn on call tracing for all processes, we want to make a pretty restrictive trace pattern, so there is no need to call trace only a few processes (usually it is not):
trans-unit.target: 我们开启所有进程的调用跟踪,我们要做一个很有限制性的跟踪模式,所以没有必要只对几个进程进行调用跟踪(通常情况下是没有的)。

trans-unit.source: We use dbg:tpl/3 to ensure to catch local calls (assume that the module has grown since the smaller version and we are unsure if this inserting of atoms is not done locally). When in doubt, always use local call tracing.
trans-unit.target: 我们使用 dbg:tpl/3 来确保捕获本地调用（假设自较小版本以来该模块已经扩展，并且我们不确定原子的插入是否不是在本地完成的）。如有疑问，请始终使用本地呼叫跟踪。
