trans-unit.target: 当描述一组功能（即模块，模块的一部分或应用程序），在进程中执行并希望使用ddll驱动程序时，我们使用术语user。一个进程可以有许多用户（不同的模块需要相同的驱动程序）和许多运行同一代码的进程，从而构成一个驱动程序的许多用户。

trans-unit.source: When developing with Erlang/OTP you usually test your programs from the interactive shell (see Getting Started With Erlang) where you can call individual functions. There is also a number of tools available, such as the graphical Debugger and the Observer tool for inspection of system information, ets and mnesia tables etc.
trans-unit.target: 使用Erlang / OTP进行开发时，通常会从交互式shell（请参见Erlang入门）中测试程序，在其中可以调用各个函数。还有许多工具可用，例如图形调试器和用于查看系统信息，ets和mnesia表等的观察者工具。

trans-unit.source: When disabling trace, the option must match the type of trace set on the function. That is, local tracing must be disabled with option local and global tracing with option global (or no option), and so on.
trans-unit.target: 禁用跟踪时，该选项必须与功能上设置的跟踪类型匹配。也就是说，必须使用选项 local 和global跟踪（选项为 global （或不使用选项））禁用本地跟踪，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: When doing make install and the default installation prefix is used, relative symbolic links will be created from /usr/local/bin to all public Erlang/OTP executables in /usr/local/lib/erlang/bin. The installation phase will try to create relative symbolic links as long as --bindir and the Erlang bin directory, located under --libdir, both have --exec-prefix as prefix. Where --exec-prefix defaults to --prefix. --prefix, --exec-prefix, --bindir, and --libdir are all arguments that can be passed to configure. One can force relative, or absolute links by passing BINDIR_SYMLINKS=relative|absolute as arguments to make during the install phase. Note that such a request might cause a failure if the request cannot be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 在进行 make install 并使用默认的安装前缀时，将从 /usr/local/bin 创建到 /usr/local/lib/erlang/bin 中所有公共Erlang / OTP可执行文件的相对符号链接。只要 --bindir 和位于 --libdir 下的Erlang bin目录都以 --exec-prefix 作为前缀，安装阶段将尝试创建相对的符号链接。其中 --exec-prefix 默认为 --prefix 。 --prefix ， --exec-prefix --bindir -prefix，-- bindir和 --libdir 都是可以传递给 configure 。一个可以强制通过传递相对的，或绝对链接 BINDIR_SYMLINKS=relative|absolute 作为参数来 make 在安装阶段。请注意，如果无法满足该请求，则可能会导致失败。

trans-unit.source: When dumping the table, some information about the table is dumped to a header at the beginning of the dump. This information contains data about the table type, name, protection, size, version, and if it is a named table. It also contains notes about what extended information is added to the file, which can be a count of the objects in the file or a MD5 sum of the header and records in the file.
trans-unit.target: 转储表时,关于表的一些信息会转储到转储开始时的表头。这些信息包含有关表类型、名称、保护、大小、版本以及是否是命名表的数据。它还包含关于向文件添加哪些扩展信息的说明,这些信息可以是文件中对象的数量,也可以是文件中头和记录的MD5和。

trans-unit.source: When editing normal text in text mode you can let Emacs reformat the text by the fill-paragraph command. This command will not work for comments since it will treat the comment characters as words.
trans-unit.target: 在文本模式下编辑普通文本时，可以让Emacs通过 fill-paragraph 命令重新格式化文本。此命令不适用于注释，因为它将注释字符视为单词。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, it prevents decoding data that can be used to attack the Erlang system. In the event of receiving unsafe data, decoding fails with a badarg error.
trans-unit.target: 启用后，它将阻止解码可用于攻击Erlang系统的数据。如果接收到不安全的数据，解码将失败，并出现 badarg 错误。

trans-unit.source: When enabling an Item that represents a group of processes, the Item is enabled on all nodes added with the n/1 or tracer/3 function.
trans-unit.target: 当使能的 Item 表示一组的过程中， Item 与所添加的所有节点上使能 n/1 或 tracer/3 的功能。

trans-unit.source: When encoding action requests for one transaction, Actions should be action_reqs(). When encoding action requests for several transactions, Actions should be [action_reqs()]. Each element of the list is part of one transaction.
trans-unit.target: 对一个事务的动作请求进行编码时， Actions 应为 action_reqs() 。对多个事务的操作请求进行编码时， Actions 应为 [action_reqs()] 。列表的每个元素都是一个事务的一部分。

trans-unit.source: When evaluating a digit map, a state machine waits for timeouts and letters reported by megaco:report_digit_event/2. The length of the various timeouts are defined in the digit_map_value() record.
trans-unit.target: 当评估一个数字图时,状态机会等待由megaco:report_digit_event/2报告的超时和信。各种超时的长度在digit_map_value()记录中定义。

trans-unit.source: When evaluating an expression, the operator with the highest priority is evaluated first. Operators with the same priority are evaluated according to their associativity.
trans-unit.target: 在评估一个表达式时,优先级最高的运算符会被首先评估。具有相同优先级的运算符根据其关联性进行评估。

trans-unit.source: When executing in an emulator thread, it is very important that you unlock all locks you have locked before letting the thread out of your control; otherwise you are very likely to deadlock the whole emulator.
trans-unit.target: 在仿真器线程中执行时，在使线程脱离控件之前，先解锁所有已锁定的锁，这一点非常重要。否则，您很有可能使整个模拟器陷入僵局。

trans-unit.source: When executing the etop script, configuration parameters can be specified as command-line options, for example, etop -node testnode@myhost -setcookie MyCookie. The following configuration parameters exist for the tool:
trans-unit.target: 执行 etop 脚本时，可以将配置参数指定为命令行选项，例如 etop -node testnode@myhost -setcookie MyCookie 。该工具存在以下配置参数：

trans-unit.source: When executing within a CTH, all timetraps are shut off. So if your CTH never returns, the entire test run is stalled.
trans-unit.target: 当在CTH内执行时,所有的时间跟踪都会被关闭。因此,如果您的CTH再也没有返回,整个测试运行就会停滞。

trans-unit.source: When failing, all three functions set erl_errno to one of:
trans-unit.target: 失败时，所有三个函数都将 erl_errno 设置为以下之一：

trans-unit.source: When fragments are added or deleted, Mnesia automatically propagates the operation to all fragmented tables that have a foreign key referring to this table. Instead of using the record key to determine which fragment to access, the value of field Attr is used. This feature makes it possible to colocate records automatically in different tables to the same node. foreign_key defaults to undefined. However, if the foreign key is set to something else, it causes the default values of the other fragmentation properties to be the same values as the actual fragmentation properties of the foreign table.
trans-unit.target: 添加或删除片段时， Mnesia 会自动将操作传播到所有具有引用此表的外键的片段表。而不是使用记录键来确定要访问哪个片段，而是使用字段 Attr 的值。此功能使将不同表中的记录自动并置到同一节点成为可能。 foreign_key 默认为 undefined 。但是，如果外键设置为其他值，则它将导致其他碎片属性的默认值与外表的实际碎片属性的值相同。

trans-unit.source: When generating the relup file, systools:make_relup/3,4 ensures that there is only one restart_emulator instruction and that it is the last instruction in the relup file.
trans-unit.target: 生成 relup 文件时， systools:make_relup/3,4 确保只有一个 restart_emulator 指令，并且它是 relup 文件中的最后一条指令。

trans-unit.source: When implementing a ssh subsystem for daemons, use -behaviour(ssh_server_channel) (Replaces ssh_daemon_channel) instead.
trans-unit.target: 为守护程序实现 ssh 子系统时，请使用 -behaviour(ssh_server_channel) （代替ssh_daemon_channel）。

trans-unit.source: When implementing a client subsystem handler, use -behaviour(ssh_client_channel) instead.
trans-unit.target: 在实现客户 -behaviour(ssh_client_channel) 系统处理程序时，请改用-behaviour（ssh_client_channel）。

trans-unit.source: When importing MIBs, ensure that the imported MIBs as well as the importing MIB are compiled using the same version of the SNMP-compiler.
trans-unit.target: 导入MIB时,请确保导入的MIB和导入的MIB使用相同版本的SNMP-编译器进行编译。

trans-unit.source: When inputting data using sql_query/[2,3] the values will always be in string format as they are part of an SQL-query. Example:
trans-unit.target: 当使用sql_query/[2,3]输入数据时,由于这些值是SQL查询的一部分,所以总是以字符串格式输入。例如:当使用sql_query/[2,3]输入数据时,由于是SQL查询的一部分,所以数据总是以字符串格式输入。

trans-unit.source: When installing a release, the application specifications are automatically updated before evaluating the relup script. Thus, no instructions are needed in the .appup file:
trans-unit.target: 安装发行版时，在评估 relup 脚本之前，将自动更新应用程序规范。因此， .appup 文件中不需要任何指令：

trans-unit.source: When instrumentation of the emulator is enabled, the emulator uses more memory and runs slower.
trans-unit.target: 启用仿真器的仪器化后,仿真器会使用更多的内存,运行速度更慢。

trans-unit.source: When interpreting the data for a process, it is helpful to know that anonymous function objects (funs) are given the following:
trans-unit.target: 当解释一个过程的数据时,知道匿名函数对象(funs)被赋予以下内容是很有帮助的。

trans-unit.source: When it comes to pure encode/decode performance, it turns out that:
trans-unit.target: 当谈到纯编码/解码性能时,事实证明。

trans-unit.source: When it is guaranteed that all trace messages are delivered to the tracer up to the point that Tracee reached at the time of the call to erlang:trace_delivered(Tracee), then a {trace_delivered, Tracee, Ref} message is sent to the caller of erlang:trace_delivered(Tracee) .
trans-unit.target: 当保证了所有跟踪消息被传递到示踪剂到如此地步， Tracee 在调用的时间达到 erlang:trace_delivered(Tracee) ，则 {trace_delivered, Tracee, Ref} 消息被发送到的呼叫者 erlang:trace_delivered(Tracee) 。

trans-unit.source: When libraries and escripts are expanded, the names of their contained applications will be displayed. Double click on an application name to launch an application window.
trans-unit.target: 当库和脚本被展开时,其包含的应用程序的名称将被显示。双击应用程序名称,启动应用程序窗口。

trans-unit.source: When linking:
trans-unit.target: 链接时。

trans-unit.source: When loading, function load/2 returns ok when any instance of the driver is present. Thus, if a driver is waiting to get unloaded (because of open ports), it simply changes state to no longer need unloading.
trans-unit.target: 加载时，如果存在任何驱动程序实例，则函数 load/2 将返回 ok 。因此，如果驱动程序正等待卸载（由于打开的端口），它只会将状态更改为不再需要卸载。

trans-unit.source: When looking at memory usage in a running system the most basic function to get information from is erlang:memory(). It returns the current memory usage of the system. instrument(3) can be used to get a more detailed breakdown of where memory is used.
trans-unit.target: 在正在运行的系统中查看内存使用情况时，最基本的信息获取方法是 erlang:memory() 。它返回系统的当前内存使用情况。 instrument(3) 可用于更详细地了解使用内存的位置。

trans-unit.source: When macros are expanded in expressions the macro calls are replaced by the macro value without any form of quoting or enclosing in parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 当宏在表达式中展开时,宏调用会被宏值所取代,而不需要任何形式的引号或括号。

trans-unit.source: When many types (or another ASN.1 entity) only differ in some minor cases, but the structure of the types is similar, only one general type can be defined and the differences can be supplied through parameters.
trans-unit.target: 当许多类型(或另一个ASN.1实体)只在一些小的情况下有差异,但类型的结构是相似的,只能定义一个通用类型,差异可以通过参数提供。

trans-unit.source: When matched against a term, both Pattern1 and Pattern2 are matched against the term. The idea behind this feature is to avoid reconstruction of terms.
trans-unit.target: 当与术语匹配时， Pattern1 和 Pattern2 均与术语匹配。该功能背后的想法是避免术语的重构。

trans-unit.source: When matching Value, value must be either a variable or an integer, or a floating point literal. Expressions are not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 匹配 Value 时，value必须是变量或整数，或者是浮点文字。不允许使用表达式。

trans-unit.source: When matching strings, the following is a valid pattern:
trans-unit.target: 匹配字符串时,以下是有效的模式。

trans-unit.source: When megaco fails to send the reply (see handle_trans_reply), for whatever reason.
trans-unit.target: 无论出于何种原因，当megaco无法发送答复时（请参阅 handle_trans_reply ）。

trans-unit.source: When messages are passed between connected nodes and a distribution header is used, the first byte containing the version number (131) is omitted from the terms that follow the distribution header. This is because the version number is implied by the version number in the distribution header.
trans-unit.target: 当消息 passed between connected nodes 并且使用 distribution header ，在分发头后面的术语中会省略包含版本号（131）的第一个字节。这是因为版本号由分发标头中的版本号暗示。

trans-unit.source: When monitoring is requested, and a corresponding {ok, pending_driver} or {ok, pending_process} would be returned, the function instead returns a tuple {ok, PendingStatus, reference()} and the process then gets a monitor message later, when the driver gets loaded. The monitor message to expect is described in the function description of monitor/2.
trans-unit.target: 当请求监视时，并且将返回相应的 {ok, pending_driver} 或 {ok, pending_process} ，该函数将返回一个元组 {ok, PendingStatus, reference()} ，然后，当驱动程序被加载。在 monitor/2 的功能描述中描述了期望的监视消息。

trans-unit.source: When multiple test specification files are specified at startup (either with ct_run -spec file1 file2 ... or ct:run_test([{spec, [File1,File2,...]}])), Common Test either executes one test run per specification file, or joins the files and performs all tests within one single test run. The first behavior is the default one. The latter requires that start flag/option join_specs is provided, for example, run_test -spec ./my_tests1.ts ./my_tests2.ts -join_specs.
trans-unit.target: 在启动时指定了多个测试规范文件时（使用 ct_run -spec file1 file2 ... 或 ct:run_test([{spec, [File1,File2,...]}]) ））， Common Test 将执行一次测试运行每个规范文件，或将文件加入并在一次测试运行中执行所有测试。第一个行为是默认行为。后者要求提供启动标志/选项 join_specs ，例如， run_test -spec ./my_tests1.ts ./my_tests2.ts -join_specs 。

trans-unit.source: When new nodes are added to the network, they are informed of the globally registered names that already exist. The network is also informed of any global names in newly connected nodes. If any name clashes are discovered, function Resolve is called. Its purpose is to decide which pid is correct. If the function crashes, or returns anything other than one of the pids, the name is unregistered. This function is called once for each name clash.
trans-unit.target: 将新节点添加到网络后，它们会被告知已经存在的全局注册名称。还向网络通知新连接的节点中的所有全局名称。如果发现任何名称冲突，则调用 Resolve 函数。其目的是确定哪个pid是正确的。如果函数崩溃，或者返回除pid之一之外的任何其他内容，则该名称未注册。每个名称冲突都会调用一次此函数。

trans-unit.source: When one node wants to connect to another node it starts with a PORT_PLEASE2_REQ request to the EPMD on the host where the node resides to get the distribution port that the node listens to.
trans-unit.target: 当一个节点要连接到另一节点时，它会向该节点所在主机上的EPMD 发出 PORT_PLEASE2_REQ 请求，以获取该节点侦听的分发端口。

trans-unit.source: When one of these option changes occurs at top-level (that is, not inside subpattern parentheses), the change applies to the remainder of the pattern that follows.
trans-unit.target: 当这些选项中的一个变化发生在顶层(即不在子模式括号内)时,该变化适用于后面模式的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: When opening an existing wrap log, it is not necessary to supply a value for option Size, but any supplied value must equal the current log size, otherwise the tuple {error, {size_mismatch, CurrentSize, NewSize}} is returned.
trans-unit.target: 打开现有的包装日志时，不必为Option Size 提供值，但是任何提供的值都必须等于当前日志大小，否则将返回元组 {error, {size_mismatch, CurrentSize, NewSize}} 。

trans-unit.source: When option global is speciified, the capture specification affects each match separately, so that:
trans-unit.target: 指定选项 global 时， capture 规范分别影响每个匹配，因此：

trans-unit.source: When option unicode is specified, the regular expression is to be specified as a valid Unicode charlist(), otherwise as any valid iodata().
trans-unit.target: 当指定选项 unicode 时，正则表达式将被指定为有效的Unicode charlist() ，否则将被指定为任何有效的 iodata() 。

trans-unit.source: When ordered to shut down, the gen_statem then calls callback function terminate(shutdown, State, Data).
trans-unit.target: 当命令关闭时， gen_statem 然后调用回调函数Terminate terminate(shutdown, State, Data) 。

trans-unit.source: When packaging code using systools, the code for each application is placed in a separate directory, lib/Application-Vsn, where Vsn is the version number.
trans-unit.target: 使用 systools 打包代码时，每个应用程序的代码都放在单独的目录 lib/Application-Vsn 中，其中 Vsn 是版本号。

trans-unit.source: When parsing a URI with an unknown scheme (that is, a scheme not found in the scheme defaults), a port number must be provided, otherwise the parsing fails.
trans-unit.target: 当解析一个未知方案的URI时(即在方案默认值中找不到的方案),必须提供一个端口号,否则解析失败。

trans-unit.source: When parts of the MIB are implemented, you recompile it and continue on by using default functions. With this approach, the SNMP agent can be developed incrementally.
trans-unit.target: 当MIB的部分内容实现后,您可以重新编译它,并通过使用默认函数继续进行。通过这种方法,可以逐步开发SNMP代理。

trans-unit.source: When performance is of highest priority and you are interested in a limited part of the ASN.1 encoded message before deciding what to do with the rest of it, an option is to decode only this small part. The situation can be a server that has to decide the addressee of a message. The addressee can be interested in the entire message, but the server can be a bottleneck that you want to spare any unnecessary load.
trans-unit.target: 当性能是最高优先级,并且你对ASN.1编码消息的有限部分感兴趣,然后再决定如何处理它的其余部分时,一个选择是只对这一小部分进行解码。这种情况可以是一个服务器必须决定一个消息的收件人。收件人可以对整个消息感兴趣,但服务器可以是一个瓶颈,你要免除任何不必要的负载。

trans-unit.source: When performing a GC, this is the max number of cache entries that will be deleted from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 当执行GC时,这是将从缓存中删除的最大缓存条目数。

trans-unit.source: When positioning in a file with other encoding than latin1, caution must be taken to set the position on a correct character boundary. For details, see position/2.
trans-unit.target: 当使用 latin1 以外的其他 encoding 定位文件时，必须注意将位置设置在正确的字符边界上。有关详细信息，请参见 position/2 。

trans-unit.source: When reading and writing to Unicode-aware entities, like a file opened for Unicode translation, you probably want to format text strings using the functions in the io module or the io_lib module. For backward compatibility reasons, these functions do not accept any list as a string, but require a special translation modifier when working with Unicode texts. The modifier is t. When applied to control character s in a formatting string, it accepts all Unicode code points and expects binaries to be in UTF-8:
trans-unit.target: 在读写支持Unicode的实体（例如为Unicode转换打开的文件）时，您可能希望使用 io 模块或 io_lib 模块中的函数来格式化文本字符串。出于向后兼容的原因，这些函数不接受任何列表作为字符串，但是在处理Unicode文本时需要特殊的转换修饰符。修饰符是 t 。当应用于格式字符串中的控制字符 s 时，它接受所有Unicode代码点，并期望二进制文件采用UTF-8：

trans-unit.source: When receiving data from untrusted sources, use option ERL_NIF_BIN2TERM_SAFE.
trans-unit.target: 从不受信任的来源接收数据时，请使用选项 ERL_NIF_BIN2TERM_SAFE 。

trans-unit.source: When receiving this event, the default simple handler clears the latest received alarm with id AlarmId.
trans-unit.target: 收到此事件时，默认的简单处理程序清除ID为 AlarmId 的最新收到的警报。

trans-unit.source: When receiving this event, the default simple handler stores the alarm. AlarmId identifies the alarm and is used when the alarm is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 收到此事件时，默认的简单处理程序将存储警报。 AlarmId 标识警报，并在清除警报时使用。

trans-unit.source: When recompiling with gcc, use flag -Wstrict-prototypes to get better warnings. Try to find a similar flag if you use another compiler.
trans-unit.target: 使用 gcc 重新编译时，请使用标志 -Wstrict-prototypes 以获得更好的警告。如果使用其他编译器，请尝试查找类似的标志。

trans-unit.source: When recursing and building a list, it is important to ensure that you attach the new elements to the beginning of the list. In this way, you will build one list, not hundreds or thousands of copies of the growing result list.
trans-unit.target: 递归并构建列表时，确保将新元素附加到列表的开头很重要。这样，您将建立一个列表，而不是成百上千的增长结果列表副本。

trans-unit.source: When restricted shell mode is activated or deactivated, new jobs started on the node run in restricted or normal mode, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 当激活或停用受限的shell模式时,节点上启动的新作业分别以受限或正常模式运行。

trans-unit.source: When run as above (this will take some time), the measurement process is done as follows:
trans-unit.target: 当按上述方法运行时(这将需要一些时间),测量过程如下。

trans-unit.source: When run on Linux, cpu_sup assumes that the /proc file system is present and accessible by cpu_sup. If it is not, cpu_sup will terminate.
trans-unit.target: 在Linux上运行时， cpu_sup 假定存在 /proc 文件系统，并且可由 cpu_sup 访问。如果不是，则 cpu_sup 将终止。

trans-unit.source: When runnable processes on priority high exist, no processes on priority low or normal are selected for execution. Notice however that this does not mean that no processes on priority low or normal can run when processes are running on priority high. When using multiple schedulers, more processes can be running in parallel than processes on priority high. That is, a low and a high priority process can execute at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 当存在优先级 high 可运行进程时，不会选择优先级 low 或 normal 进程来执行。但是请注意，这也并不意味着就没有优先处理 low 或 normal 可以运行在进程优先级运行 high 。当使用多个调度程序时，与优先级 high 进程相比，可以并行运行更多的进程。即， low 优先级进程和 high 优先级进程可以同时执行。

trans-unit.source: When runnable processes on priority max exist, no processes on priority low, normal, or high are selected for execution. As with priority high, processes on lower priorities can execute in parallel with processes on priority max.
trans-unit.target: 当存在优先级为 max 的可运行进程时，不会选择优先级为 low ， normal 或 high 的进程来执行。与优先级 high ，就较低优先级的进程可以并行与优先级进程执行 max 。

trans-unit.source: When running SMP erlang on a multi-core machine the "throughput" is significantly higher. The mstone1 test is an extreme test, but it shows what is gained by using the reentrant flex-scanner.
trans-unit.target: 当在多核机器上运行SMP erlang时,"吞吐量 "会明显提高。mstone1测试是一个极端的测试,但它显示了使用reentrant flex-scanner的好处。

trans-unit.source: When running a distributed system with two or more participating nodes, the function mnesia:start() must be executed on each participating node. This would typically be part of the boot script in an embedded environment. In a test environment or an interactive environment, mnesia:start() can also be used either from the Erlang shell or another program.
trans-unit.target: 当运行具有两个或更多参与节点的分布式系统时，必须在每个参与节点上执行函数 mnesia:start() 。在嵌入式环境中，这通常是启动脚本的一部分。在测试环境或交互式环境中，也可以从Erlang Shell或其他程序中使用 mnesia:start() 。

trans-unit.source: When running in utf8 mode, functions list_dir/1 and read_link/1 never return raw filenames. To return all filenames including raw filenames, use functions list_dir_all/1 and read_link_all/1.
trans-unit.target: 在 utf8 模式下运行时，函数 list_dir/1 和 read_link/1 从不返回原始文件名。要返回所有文件名，包括原始文件名，请使用函数 list_dir_all/1 和 read_link_all/1 。

trans-unit.source: When running on OSs lacking support for monotonic time, heart is susceptible to system clock adjustments of more than HEART_BEAT_TIMEOUT seconds. When this happens, heart times out and tries to reboot the system. This can occur, for example, if the system clock is adjusted automatically by use of the Network Time Protocol (NTP).
trans-unit.target: 在缺乏单调时间支持的操作系统上运行时， heart 很容易受到超过 HEART_BEAT_TIMEOUT 秒的系统时钟调整的影响。发生这种情况时， heart 会超时并尝试重新引导系统。例如，如果通过使用网络时间协议（NTP）自动调整系统时钟，则会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: When running on Windows, suppresses creation of a new console window when spawning the port program. (This option has no effect on other platforms.)
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 上运行时,当生成 port 程序时,会抑制创建新的控制台窗口 (这个选项对其他平台没有影响)。(这个选项对其他平台没有影响。)

trans-unit.source: When selecting data from a table, all data types are returned from the database to the ODBC driver as an ODBC data type. The tables below shows the mapping between those data types and what is returned by the Erlang API.
trans-unit.target: 当从表中选择数据时,所有的数据类型都会以ODBC数据类型的形式从数据库返回给ODBC驱动程序。下表显示了这些数据类型与Erlang API返回的数据类型之间的映射。

trans-unit.source: When sending data to a port. Ports understand deep lists so there is no reason to flatten the list before sending it to the port.
trans-unit.target: 当向 port 发送数据时。端口能够理解深层列表,因此没有理由在发送列表到端口之前将其扁平化。

trans-unit.source: When sending one transaction in a message, Actions should be action_reqs() (UserReply will then be user_reply()). When sending several transactions in a message, Actions should be [action_reqs()] (UserReply will then be [user_reply()]). Each element of the list is part of one transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在消息中发送一个事务时， Actions 应为 action_reqs() （ UserReply 将为 user_reply() ）。在消息中发送多个事务时， Actions 应为 [action_reqs()] （ UserReply 将为 [user_reply()] ）。列表的每个元素都是一个事务的一部分。

trans-unit.source: When sending one transaction in a message, Actions should be action_reqs(). When sending several transactions in a message, Actions should be [action_reqs()]. Each element of the list is part of one transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在消息中发送一个事务时， Actions 应为 action_reqs() 。在消息中发送多个事务时， Actions 应为 [action_reqs()] 。列表的每个元素都是一个事务的一部分。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, the runtime system logs an error event via logger, containing details about the process when the maximum heap size is reached. One log event is sent each time the limit is reached.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 true 时，运行时系统通过 logger 记录错误事件，其中包含达到最大堆大小时有关进程的详细信息。每次达到限制时，都会发送一个日志事件。

trans-unit.source: When set to true, the runtime system sends an untrappable exit signal with reason kill to the process if the maximum heap size is reached. The garbage collection that triggered the kill is not completed, instead the process exits as soon as possible. When set to false, no exit signal is sent to the process, instead it continues executing.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 true ，则在达到最大堆大小时，运行时系统会向进程发送不可中断的退出信号，其原因是 kill 。垃圾收集触发 kill 没有完成，而不是在进程退出尽快。当设置为 false 时，没有退出信号发送到该进程，而是继续执行。

trans-unit.source: When set, informs the peer to use {IP, Port} as the primary address of the local endpoint for the association specified by assoc_id.
trans-unit.target: 设置后，通知对等方使用 {IP, Port} 作为 assoc_id 指定的关联的本地端点的主地址。

trans-unit.source: When set, requests that the local endpoint uses the value specified by adaptation_ind as the Adaptation Indication parameter for establishing new associations. For details, see RFC 2960 and Sockets API Extenstions for SCTP.
trans-unit.target: 设置时，本地端点使用由指定的值请求 adaptation_ind 作为建立新的关联适应指示参数。有关详细信息，请参见 RFC 2960 和 Sockets API Extenstions for SCTP 。

trans-unit.source: When setting up a trace, the following features can also be activated:
trans-unit.target: 设置跟踪时,还可以激活以下功能。

trans-unit.source: When something is to be sent, everything is packed into one message, unless the trigger was a reply transaction and the added size of the reply and all the requests is greater then trans_req_maxsize, in which case the stored transactions are sent first in a separate message and the reply in another message.
trans-unit.target: 当要发送某些内容时，所有内容都打包成一条消息，除非触发器是一个应答事务，并且应答的增加大小且所有请求都大于 trans_req_maxsize ，在这种情况下，存储的事务首先在单独的消息中发送然后在另一封邮件中回复。

trans-unit.source: When sorting or merging files, only the first of a sequence of terms that compare equal (==) is output if this option is set to true. Defaults to false, which implies that all terms that compare equal are output. When checking files for sortedness, a check that no pair of consecutive terms compares equal is done if this option is set to true.
trans-unit.target: 在对文件进行排序或合并时，如果此选项设置为 true ,则仅输出比较相等（ == ）的术语序列中的第一个。默认为 false ，这意味着输出所有比较相等的项。在检查文件的排序时，如果此选项设置为 true ，则将检查没有一对连续的术语比较相等。

trans-unit.source: When started stand_alone only the pid can be used.
trans-unit.target: 当启动 stand_alone 时,只能使用pid。

trans-unit.source: When started stand_alone only the pid can used.
trans-unit.target: 当启动 stand_alone 时,只能使用pid。

trans-unit.source: When started stand_alone.
trans-unit.target: 启动 stand_alone 时。

trans-unit.source: When started, the node waits for all nodes specified by sync_nodes_mandatory and sync_nodes_optional to come up. When all nodes are up, or when all mandatory nodes are up and the time specified by sync_nodes_timeout has elapsed, all applications start. If not all mandatory nodes are up, the node terminates.
trans-unit.target: 启动后，该节点等待 sync_nodes_mandatory 和 sync_nodes_optional 指定的所有节点出现。当所有节点都已启动，或者所有必需节点都已启动并且经过 sync_nodes_timeout 指定的时间时，所有应用程序都将启动。如果不是所有必需节点都启动，则该节点终止。

trans-unit.source: When started, the supervisor does not start any child processes. Instead, all child processes are added dynamically by calling:
trans-unit.target: 当启动时,监督程序不会启动任何子进程。相反,所有子进程都是通过调用动态添加的。

trans-unit.source: When starting Mnesia, a .LOG file called LATEST.LOG is created and placed in the database directory. This file is used by Mnesia to log disc-based transactions. This includes all transactions that write at least one record in a table that is of storage type disc_copies or disc_only_copies. The file also includes all operations that manipulate the schema itself, such as creating new tables. The log format can vary with different implementations of Mnesia. The Mnesia log is currently implemented in the standard library module disk_log in Kernel.
trans-unit.target: 启动 Mnesia 时，将创建一个名为 LATEST.LOG 的 .LOG 文件并将其放置在数据库目录中。 Mnesia 使用此文件记录基于磁盘的事务。这包括所有在表中至少写入一条记录的存储类型 disc_copies 或 disc_only_copies 的事务。该文件还包括操纵模式本身的所有操作，例如创建新表。日志格式可能会因 Mnesia 的不同实现而异。在 Mnesia 的日志在标准库模块目前实施 disk_log 的 Kernel 。

trans-unit.source: When starting prim_app as defined above, the application controller calls the following callback functions before application:start(prim_app) returns a value:
trans-unit.target: 如上定义启动 prim_app 时，应用程序控制器会在 application:start(prim_app) 返回值之前调用以下回调函数：

trans-unit.source: When starting Erlang in embedded mode, it is assumed that exactly one system configuration file is used, named sys.config. This file is to be located in $ROOT/releases/Vsn, where $ROOT is the Erlang/OTP root installation directory and Vsn is the release version.
trans-unit.target: 在嵌入式模式下启动Erlang时，假定只使用了一个名为 sys.config 的系统配置文件。该文件位于 $ROOT/releases/Vsn ，其中 $ROOT 是Erlang / OTP根安装目录，而 Vsn 是发行版本。

trans-unit.source: When starting Erlang/OTP using the boot script, all applications from the .rel file are automatically loaded and started:
trans-unit.target: 使用启动脚本启动Erlang / OTP时， .rel 文件中的所有应用程序都会自动加载并启动：

trans-unit.source: When starting a primary application with included applications, the primary application is started the normal way, that is:
trans-unit.target: 当启动包含应用程序的主应用程序时,主应用程序的启动方式是正常的,即。

trans-unit.source: When starting an Erlang node, the default behaviour is that all log events on level notice or more severe, are logged to the terminal via the default handler. To also log info events, you can either change the primary log level to info:
trans-unit.target: 当启动一个Erlang节点，默认行为是对所有级别的日志事件 notice 或更严重的，是通过默认的处理程序记录到终端。要同时记录信息事件，可以将主日志级别更改为 info ：

trans-unit.source: When starting external programs on Solaris, the system call vfork is used in preference to fork for performance reasons, although it has a history of being less robust. If there are problems using vfork, setting environment variable ERL_NO_VFORK to any value causes fork to be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 在Solaris上启动外部程序时，出于性能方面的考虑，优先使用系统调用 vfork 进行 fork ，尽管它的运行可靠性较差。如果使用 vfork 出现问题， ERL_NO_VFORK 环境变量ERL_NO_VFORK设置为任何值都会导致使用 fork 。

trans-unit.source: When starting snmpa_local_db it always tries to open an existing database. If false, and some errors occur, a new database is created instead. If true, an existing file will be repaired. If force, the table will be repaired even if it was properly closed.
trans-unit.target: 启动snmpa_local_db时，它将始终尝试打开现有数据库。如果为 false ，并且发生某些错误，则会创建一个新数据库。如果为 true ，将修复现有文件。如果使用 force ，即使桌子已正确关闭，也将对其进行维修。

trans-unit.source: When starting the Inets application, a manager process for the default profile is started. The functions in this API that do not explicitly use a profile accesses the default profile. A profile keeps track of proxy options, cookies, and other options that can be applied to more than one request.
trans-unit.target: 启动 Inets 应用程序时，将启动默认配置文件的管理器进程。此API中未明确使用配置文件的功能将访问默认配置文件。配置文件跟踪代理选项，Cookie和可应用于多个请求的其他选项。

trans-unit.source: When starting the flex scanner a port to the linked in driver is created. This port has to be owned by a process. This process must not die. If it does the port will also terminate. Therefor:
trans-unit.target: 当启动flex扫描仪时,会创建一个连接到驱动的端口。这个端口必须由一个进程拥有。该进程不得死亡。如果该进程死亡,则端口也将终止。因此。

trans-unit.source: When starting this release, three things must be specified:
trans-unit.target: 启动这个版本时,必须指定三件事。

trans-unit.source: When starting with Unicode, one often stumbles over some common issues. This section describes some methods of dealing with Unicode data.
trans-unit.target: 在开始使用Unicode时,经常会被一些常见的问题绊倒。本节介绍一些处理Unicode数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: When stopped, the application is still loaded.
trans-unit.target: 停止时,应用程序仍在加载。

trans-unit.source: When streaming to the calling processes using option {self, once}, the first message has an extra element, that is, {http, {RequestId, stream_start, Headers, Pid}}. This is the process id to be used as an argument to httpc:stream_next/1 to trigger the next message to be sent to the calling process.
trans-unit.target: 当使用选项 {self, once} 流式传输到调用进程时，第一条消息具有一个额外的元素，即 {http, {RequestId, stream_start, Headers, Pid}} 。这是进程ID，用作 httpc:stream_next/1 的参数，以触​​发下一条消息发送给调用进程。

trans-unit.source: When string or binary objects are stored in the registry it is important that some simple guidelines are followed.
trans-unit.target: 当字符串或二进制对象存储在注册表中时,必须遵循一些简单的准则。

trans-unit.source: When tables are forcefully loaded from the local disc, all operations that were performed on the replicated table while the local node was down, and the remote replica was alive, are lost. This can cause the database to become inconsistent.
trans-unit.target: 从本地磁盘强行加载表时,会丢失本地节点宕机而远程复制体活着时对复制表执行的所有操作。这可能导致数据库变得不一致。

trans-unit.source: When tests start, Common Test Master displays information to console about the involved nodes. Common Test Master also reports when tests finish, successfully or unsuccessfully. If connection is lost to a node, the test on that node is considered finished. Common Test Master does not attempt to re-establish contact with the failing node.
trans-unit.target: 当测试开始时， Common Test Master将显示有关所涉及节点的信息以进行控制台。 Common Test Master还报告测试成功或失败的时间。如果失去与某个节点的连接，则认为该节点上的测试已完成。 Common Test Master不会尝试与发生故障的节点重新建立联系。

trans-unit.source: When the 'CHANGE' message has been received you are guaranteed not to retrieve the old time offset when calling erlang:time_offset(). Notice that you can observe the change of the time offset when calling erlang:time_offset() before you get the 'CHANGE' message.
trans-unit.target: 当 'CHANGE' 已收到消息你保证不会恢复老的时候打电话时偏移 erlang:time_offset() 。请注意，在收到 'CHANGE' 消息之前，您可以在调用 erlang:time_offset() 时观察时间偏移的变化。

trans-unit.source: When the callback mode is handle_event_function, the state can be any term and the state callback name is Module:handle_event/4. This makes it easy to branch depending on state or event as you desire. Be careful about which events you handle in which states so that you do not accidentally postpone an event forever creating an infinite busy loop.
trans-unit.target: 当 callback mode 为 handle_event_function 时，状态可以是任何术语，并且状态回调名称为 Module:handle_event/4 。这使您可以根据需要轻松地根据状态或事件进行分支。请注意在哪种状态下处理哪些事件，以免您意外地将事件永远推迟，以免造成无限繁忙循环。

trans-unit.source: When the callback mode is state_functions, the state must be an atom and is used as the state callback name; see Module:StateName/3. This co-locates all code for a specific state in one function as the gen_statem engine branches depending on state name. Note the fact that the callback function Module:terminate/3 makes the state name terminate unusable in this mode.
trans-unit.target: 当 callback mode 为 state_functions 时，状态必须是原子，并且用作状态回调名称；参见 Module:StateName/3 。当 gen_statem 引擎根据状态名称分支时，这会将特定状态的所有代码共存于一个函数中。请注意，在此模式下，回调函数 Module:terminate/3 会使状态名称 terminate 不可用。

trans-unit.source: When the Addr value does not contain a port number, the value of intAgentUDPPort is used.
trans-unit.target: 当 Addr 值不包含端口号时，将使用 intAgentUDPPort 的值。

trans-unit.source: When the erl_tar core wants to, for example, write a piece of Data, it would call ExampleFun(write, {UserPrivate,Data}).
trans-unit.target: 例如，当 erl_tar 核心想要写入一段 Data ，它将调用 ExampleFun(write, {UserPrivate,Data}) 。

trans-unit.source: When the fprof server is stopped the collected raw profile data is lost.
trans-unit.target: 当 fprof 服务器停止时，收集的原始配置文件数据将丢失。

trans-unit.source: When the gen_statem runs with state enter calls, these functions are also called with arguments (enter, OldState, ...) whenever the state changes. In this case there are some restrictions on the actions that may be returned: postpone() is not allowed since a state enter call is not an event so there is no event to postpone, and {next_event,_,_} is not allowed since using state enter calls should not affect how events are consumed and produced. You may also not change states from this call. Should you return {next_state,NextState, ...} with NextState =/= State the gen_statem crashes. Note that it is actually allowed to use {repeat_state, NewData, ...} although it makes little sense since you immediately will be called again with a new state enter call making this just a weird way of looping, and there are better ways to loop in Erlang. If you do not update NewData and have some loop termination condition, or if you use {repeat_state_and_data, _} or repeat_state_and_data you have an infinite loop! You are advised to use {keep_state,...}, {keep_state_and_data,_} or keep_state_and_data since changing states from a state enter call is not possible anyway.
trans-unit.target: 当 gen_statem 通过 state enter calls 运行时 (enter, OldState, ...) 只要状态发生变化，这些函数也将使用参数（enter，OldState等）进行调用。在这种情况下，也有对一些限制 actions 可能返回： postpone() 因为是不允许的状态进入的呼叫是不是一个事件，所以没有事件推迟，并 {next_event,_,_} 是不允许的，因为使用状态回车调用不应影响事件的消费和产生方式。您也可能无法更改此呼叫的状态。如果您返回 {next_state,NextState, ...} 与 NextState =/= State 的 gen_statem 崩溃。请注意，实际上它被允许使用 {repeat_state, NewData, ...} 尽管这没有什么意义，因为您将立即使用新的状态回车再次调用enter调用，这使得这只是一种怪异的循环方式，并且还有更好的方法在Erlang中循环。如果您不更新 NewData 并具有某些循环终止条件，或者使用 {repeat_state_and_data, _} 或 repeat_state_and_data ,则将导致无限循环！建议您使用 {keep_state,...} ， {keep_state_and_data,_} 或 keep_state_and_data ,因为无论如何都无法从状态回车更改状态。

trans-unit.source: When the Cover analysis is ready, Cover is stopped and all Cover compiled modules are unloaded. The code for channel is now loaded as usual from a .beam file in the current path.
trans-unit.target: 当Coverage分析准备就绪时，Cover停止并且所有Cover编译的模块都被 unloaded 。现在可以照常从当前路径中的 .beam 文件加载 channel 的代码。

trans-unit.source: When the Erlang function t/1 was applied to an Xref server loaded with the current version of OTP, the returned value was close to 84 (percent). This means that the number of indirectly used modules is approximately six times greater when using the module graph. So the answer to the above stated question is that it is definitely worth while using the function graph for this particular analysis. Finally, note that in the presence of unresolved calls, the graphs may be incomplete, which means that there may be indirectly used modules that do not show up.
trans-unit.target: 当将Erlang函数 t/1 应用于加载有当前版本OTP的Xref服务器时，返回值接近84（百分比）。这意味着使用模块图时，间接使用的模块数大约是原来的六倍。因此，上述问题的答案是，在使用函数图进行此特定分析时，绝对值得。最后，请注意，在存在未解决的调用的情况下，图形可能不完整，这意味着可能存在未使用的间接使用的模块。

trans-unit.source: When the Erlang mode is correctly installed, it is automatically activated when a file ending in .erl or .hrl is opened in Emacs.
trans-unit.target: 正确安装Erlang模式后，在Emacs中打开以 .erl 或 .hrl 结尾的文件时，它将自动激活。

trans-unit.source: When the Erlang runtime system is automatically started from the S75otp.system script, the TERM environment variable must be set. The following is a minimal setting:
trans-unit.target: 从 S75otp.system 脚本自动启动Erlang运行时系统时，必须设置 TERM 环境变量。以下是最小设置：

trans-unit.source: When the MGC receives its first message, the Service Change Request, the Megaco application will automatically establish the connection by using the MG MID found in the message header as remote mid.
trans-unit.target: 当MGC收到第一个消息,即 "服务变更请求 "时,Megaco应用程序将使用消息头中的MGID作为远程mid自动建立连接。

trans-unit.source: When the MIB definition work is finished, there are two major issues left.
trans-unit.target: 当MIB定义工作完成后,还剩下两个主要问题。

trans-unit.source: When the SASL application is started, it adds a Logger handler that formats and writes these reports, as specified in the configuration parameters for SASL.
trans-unit.target: 启动SASL应用程序后，它会添加一个Logger处理程序，以格式化和写入这些报告，如 configuration parameters for SASL 的配置参数中所指定。

trans-unit.source: When the SNMP manager has crashed, the dependent client application has to wait for the SNMP manager to be restarted before it can reconnect.
trans-unit.target: SNMP管理器崩溃后，从属客户端应用程序必须等待SNMP管理器重新启动才能重新连接。

trans-unit.source: When the agent receives a request, it keeps the request ID for one second after the response is sent. If the agent receives another request with the same request ID during this time, from the same IP address and UDP port, that request will be discarded. This mechanism has nothing to do with the function snmpa:current_request_id/0.
trans-unit.target: 代理收到请求后，在发送响应后，它将请求ID保留一秒钟。如果代理在此期间从相同的IP地址和UDP端口接收到另一个具有相同请求ID的请求，则该请求将被丢弃。该机制与 snmpa:current_request_id/0 函数无关。

trans-unit.source: When the agent receives the same get-request as above, a call will be made to generic_access(get,'IPADR').
trans-unit.target: 当代理接收到与上述相同的get-request时，将对 generic_access(get, ' IPADR') 进行调用。

trans-unit.source: When the async operation is done, ready_async driver entry function is called. If ready_async is NULL in the driver entry, the async_free function is called instead.
trans-unit.target: 异步操作完成后，将 ready_async 驱动程序入口函数。如果驱动程序条目中的 ready_async 为 NULL ，则调用 async_free 函数。

trans-unit.source: When the choice of directories in the code path is strict, the directory that ends up in the code path is exactly the stated one. This means that if, for example, the directory $OTPROOT/lib/mnesia-4.4.7/ebin is explicitly added to the code path, the code server does not load files from $OTPROOT/lib/mnesia-4.4.7.ez/mnesia-4.4.7/ebin.
trans-unit.target: 当代码路径中的目录选择 strict ，最终在代码路径中的目录就是所述目录。这意味着，例如，如果目录 $OTPROOT/lib/mnesia-4.4.7/ebin 已明确添加到代码路径，则代码服务器不会从 $OTPROOT/lib/mnesia-4.4.7.ez/mnesia-4.4.7/ebin 加载文件。/mnesia-4.4.7/ebin。

trans-unit.source: When the command running at the other end terminates, the following message can be sent to return the exit status of the command. A zero exit_status usually means that the command terminated successfully. This event is sent as a result of calling ssh_connection:exit_status/3.
trans-unit.target: 当另一端运行的命令终止时，可以发送以下消息以返回命令的退出状态。零 exit_status 通常表示命令成功终止。调用 ssh_connection:exit_status/3 会发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: When the compiler encounters the module attribute -behaviour(Behaviour). in a module Mod, it calls Behaviour:behaviour_info(callbacks) and compares the result with the set of functions actually exported from Mod, and issues a warning if any callback function is missing.
trans-unit.target: 当编译器遇到模块属性 -behaviour(Behaviour). 在 Mod 模块中，它调用 Behaviour:behaviour_info(callbacks) 并将结果与​​实际从 Mod 导出的函数集进行比较，并在缺少任何回调函数时发出警告。

trans-unit.source: When the data has passed through an Ets table, erts_debug:size/1 and erts_debug:flat_size/1 return the same value. Sharing has been lost.
trans-unit.target: 当数据通过Ets表时， erts_debug:size/1 和 erts_debug:flat_size/1 返回相同的值。共享已丢失。

trans-unit.source: When the data is returned, we deallocate our data.
trans-unit.target: 当数据返回时,我们会对我们的数据进行deallocate。

trans-unit.source: When the driver has passed the driver_entry over to the emulator, the driver is not allowed to modify the driver_entry.
trans-unit.target: 当驾驶员已通过 driver_entry 到模拟器，司机没有允许修改 driver_entry 。

trans-unit.source: When the driver is implemented, one would preferably write an Erlang interface for the driver to be able to test the functionality of the driver separately. This interface can then be used by the distribution module, which will cover the details of the protocol from the net_kernel.
trans-unit.target: 当实现驱动程序时，最好为驱动程序编写一个Erlang接口，以便能够分别测试驱动程序的功能。然后，分发模块可以使用此接口，分发模块将覆盖 net_kernel 中协议的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: When the driver is loaded. This callback must have a special name and inform the emulator of what callbacks are to be used by returning a pointer to a ErlDrvEntry struct, which is to be properly filled in (see below).
trans-unit.target: 驱动程序加载时。此回调必须具有特殊名称，并通过返回指向 ErlDrvEntry 结构的指针来告知仿真器要使用的回调，该指针将被正确填充（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: When the emulator is run with instrumentation, the system value is more accurate, but memory directly allocated for malloc (and friends) is still not part of the system value. Direct calls to malloc are only done from OS-specific runtime libraries and perhaps from user-implemented Erlang drivers that do not use the memory allocation functions in the driver interface.
trans-unit.target: 当仿真器与工具一起运行时， system 值更加准确，但是直接分配给 malloc （和好友）的内存仍然不是 system 值的一部分。对 malloc 的直接调用只能从特定于OS的运行时库中完成，也可以从用户实现的Erlang驱动程序中完成，这些驱动程序不使用驱动程序接口中的内存分配功能。

trans-unit.source: When the end of the binary is reached and the second clause matches, the match context will simply be discarded (removed in the next garbage collection, as there is no longer any reference to it).
trans-unit.target: 当到达二进制结束,第二个子句匹配时,匹配上下文将被简单地丢弃(在下一次垃圾收集中删除,因为不再有任何引用)。

trans-unit.source: When the external process connected to the port exits, a message of the form {Port,{exit_status,Status}} is sent to the connected process, where Status is the exit status of the external process. If the program aborts on Unix, the same convention is used as the shells do (that is, 128+signal).
trans-unit.target: 当连接到端口的外部进程退出时， {Port,{exit_status,Status}} 连接的进程发送{Port，{exit_status，Status}}形式的消息，其中 Status 是外部进程的退出状态。如果程序在Unix上中止，则使用与Shell相同的约定（即128+信号）。

trans-unit.source: When the function mnesia:read/3 cannot be used, Mnesia provides the programmer with several functions for matching records against a pattern. The most useful ones are the following:
trans-unit.target: 当无法使用函数 mnesia:read/3 时， Mnesia 将为程序员提供多个函数，用于根据模式匹配记录。以下是最有用的：

trans-unit.source: When the function returns {ok, pending_driver} or {ok, pending_process}, one can get information about when the driver is actually loaded by using option {monitor, MonitorOption}.
trans-unit.target: 当函数返回 {ok, pending_driver} 或 {ok, pending_process} ，可以使用选项 {monitor, MonitorOption} 获取有关何时实际加载驱动程序的信息。

trans-unit.source: When the indexed set is a set of subsets of a set X, we call x a family of subsets of X.
trans-unit.target: 当索引集是一组X的子集时，我们称xa 为X 的子集族。

trans-unit.source: When the initial message arrives the transport service forwards it to the protocol engine which automatically sets up the connection and invokes UserMod:handle_connect/2 before it invokes UserMod:handle_trans_request/3 with the Service Change Request like this:
trans-unit.target: 当初始消息到达时,传输服务将其转发到协议引擎,协议引擎自动建立连接,并调用UserMod:handle_connect/2,然后再调用UserMod:handle_trans_request/3与服务变更请求,像这样。

trans-unit.source: When the instrumentation function for the distributed table is called, the request should be forwarded to the table coordinator. The coordinator finds the requested information among the table holders and then returns the answer to the instrumentation function. The SNMP toolkit contains no support for coordination of tables since this must be independent of the implementation.
trans-unit.target: 调用分布式表的仪表函数时,应将请求转给表协调器。协调器在表持有者中找到所请求的信息,然后将答案返回给仪表函数。SNMP工具包中不包含对表协调的支持,因为这必须独立于实现。

trans-unit.source: When the logs are full, run_erl deletes and reuses the oldest log file.
trans-unit.target: 当日志已满时， run_erl 删除并重新使用最早的日志文件。

trans-unit.source: When the message queue grows larger than this threshold, the handler switches to a mode in which it drops all new events that senders want to log. Dropping an event in this mode means that the call to the log function never results in a message being sent to the handler, but the function returns without taking any action. The handler keeps logging the events that are already in its message queue, and when the length of the message queue is reduced to a level below the threshold, synchronous or asynchronous mode is resumed. Notice that when the handler activates or deactivates drop mode, information about it is printed in the log.
trans-unit.target: 当消息队列大于这个阈值时,处理程序就会切换到一种模式,在这种模式下,处理程序会丢弃所有发送者想要记录的新事件。在这种模式下丢弃一个事件意味着对日志函数的调用永远不会导致消息被发送到处理程序,而是函数返回而不采取任何行动。处理程序继续记录已经在其消息队列中的事件,当消息队列的长度减少到低于阈值的水平时,同步或异步模式就会恢复。注意,当处理程序激活或停用投递模式时,相关信息会打印在日志中。

trans-unit.source: When the modifier l is specified, no detection of printable character lists takes place, for example:
trans-unit.target: 指定修饰符 l 时，不会检测可打印字符列表，例如：

trans-unit.source: When the monitor is triggered a 'CHANGE' message is sent to the monitoring process. A 'CHANGE' message has the following pattern:
trans-unit.target: 触发监视器后， 'CHANGE' 消息将发送到监视过程。阿 'CHANGE' 消息具有以下模式：

trans-unit.source: When the number of schedulers is less than or equal to the reader groups limit, each scheduler has its own reader group. When the number of schedulers is larger than the reader groups limit, schedulers share reader groups. Shared reader groups degrade read lock and read unlock performance while many reader groups degrade write lock performance. So, the limit is a tradeoff between performance for read operations and performance for write operations. Each reader group consumes 64 byte in each read/write lock.
trans-unit.target: 当调度器的数量小于或等于读者组限制时,每个调度器有自己的读者组。当调度器的数量大于读者组限制时,调度器共享读者组。共享读者组会降低读锁和读解锁性能,而很多读者组会降低写锁性能。所以,这个限制是读操作的性能和写操作的性能之间的权衡。每个读者组在每次读/写锁中消耗64个字节。

trans-unit.source: When the option maps is given, no .hrl files will be generated. The rest of this section describes the behavior of the compiler when maps is not used.
trans-unit.target: 给出选项 maps ，将不会生成 .hrl 文件。本节的其余部分描述了不使用 maps 时编译器的行为。

trans-unit.source: When the option verify is set to verify_peer the check public_key:pkix_verify_hostname/2 will be performed in addition to the usual x509-path validation checks. If the check fails the error {bad_cert, hostname_check_failed} will be propagated to the path validation fun verify_fun, where it is possible to do customized checks by using the full possibilities of the public_key:pkix_verify_hostname/3 API. When the option server_name_indication is provided, its value (the DNS name) will be used as ReferenceID to public_key:pkix_verify_hostname/2. When no server_name_indication option is given, the Host argument will be used as Server Name Indication extension. The Host argument will also be used for the public_key:pkix_verify_hostname/2 check and if the Host argument is an inet:ip_address() the ReferenceID used for the check will be {ip, Host} otherwise dns_id will be assumed with a fallback to ip if that fails.
trans-unit.target: 当选项 verify 设置为 verify_peer 时，除了通常的x509路径验证检查之外，还将执行检查 public_key:pkix_verify_hostname/2 。如果检查失败，则会将错误{bad_cert，hostname_check_failed}传播到路径验证 verify_fun ，在这里可以使用 public_key:pkix_verify_hostname/3 API 的所有功能进行自定义检查。当选项 server_name_indication 提供，其值（DNS名称）将被用作 ReferenceID 到 public_key:pkix_verify_hostname/2 。如果未提供 server_name_indication 选项，则 Host 参数将用作服务器名称指示扩展名。该 Host 的参数也将被用于 public_key:pkix_verify_hostname/2 检查，如果 Host 参数是 inet:ip_address() 的 ReferenceID 用于检查将是 {ip, Host} 否则 dns_id 将与回退到假定 ip 如果失败。

trans-unit.source: When the port has been opened, the driver can be called. In the pg_sync example, we do not have any data from the port, only the return value from the port_control.
trans-unit.target: 打开端口后，可以调用驱动程序。在 pg_sync 示例中，我们没有来自端口的任何数据，只有 port_control 的返回值。

trans-unit.source: When the port is in data mode, all data is sent to Erlang in a format that suits the distribution. In fact, the raw data will never reach any Erlang process, but will be translated/interpreted by the emulator itself and then delivered in the correct format to the correct processes. In the current emulator version, received data is to be tagged with a single byte of 100. That is what the macro DIST_MAGIC_RECV_TAG is defined to. The tagging of data in the distribution can be changed in the future.
trans-unit.target: 当端口处于 data 模式时，所有数据都以适合分发的格式发送到Erlang。实际上，原始数据将永远不会到达任何Erlang进程，而是将由仿真器本身进行翻译/解释，然后以正确的格式传递给正确的进程。在当前的仿真器版本中，接收到的数据将用单个字节100进行标记。这就是宏 DIST_MAGIC_RECV_TAG 的定义。分发中的数据标签将来可以更改。

trans-unit.source: When the protocol is available to Erlang through a driver and an Erlang interface module, a distribution module can be written. The distribution module is a module with well-defined callbacks, much like a gen_server (there is no compiler support for checking the callbacks, though). This module implements:
trans-unit.target: 当协议通过驱动程序和Erlang接口模块可用于Erlang时，可以编写分发模块。分发模块是具有明确定义的回调的模块，非常类似于 gen_server （尽管编译器不支持检查回调）。该模块实现：

trans-unit.source: When the queue contains data, the driver does not close until the queue is empty.
trans-unit.target: 当队列包含数据时,驱动程序不会关闭,直到队列清空。

trans-unit.source: When the release handler encounters the instruction, it first generates a temporary boot file, which starts the new versions of the emulator and the core applications, and the old version of all other applications. Then it shuts down the current emulator by calling init:reboot(), see the init(3) manual page in Kernel. All processes are terminated gracefully and the system is rebooted by the heart program, using the temporary boot file. After the reboot, the rest of the relup instructions are executed. This is done as a part of the temporary boot script.
trans-unit.target: 当发布处理程序遇到指令时，它首先生成一个临时启动文件，该文件将启动仿真器和核心应用程序的新版本以及所有其他应用程序的旧版本。然后，它通过调用 init:reboot() 来关闭当前仿真器，请参阅内核中的 init(3) 手册页。使用临时启动文件，所有进程都会正常终止，并且由 heart 程序重新启动系统。重新引导后，将执行其余的relup指令。这是作为临时启动脚本的一部分完成的。

trans-unit.source: When the release handler encounters the instruction, it shuts down the emulator by calling init:reboot(), see the init(3) manual page in Kernel. All processes are terminated gracefully and the system can then be rebooted by the heart program using the new release version. No more upgrade instruction is executed after the restart.
trans-unit.target: 当释放处理程序遇到指令时，它通过调用 init:reboot() 来关闭仿真器，请参见内核中的 init(3) 手册页。所有进程都会正常终止，然后可以使用新的发行版本由 heart 程序重新启动系统。重新启动后不再执行任何升级指令。

trans-unit.source: When the request is received, the gen_server calls handle_cast(Request, State), which is expected to return a tuple {noreply,State1}. State1 is a new value for the state of the gen_server.
trans-unit.target: 收到请求后， gen_server 调用 handle_cast(Request, State) ，该方法将返回一个元组 {noreply,State1} 。 State1 是 gen_server 的状态的新值。

trans-unit.source: When the restricted shell evaluates an expression and encounters a function call or an operator application, it calls a callback function (with information about the function call in question). This callback function returns true to let the shell go ahead with the evaluation, or false to abort it. There are two possible callback functions for the user to implement:
trans-unit.target: 当受限制的外壳程序计算表达式并遇到函数调用或运算符应用程序时，它将调用回调函数（带有有关所讨论函数调用的信息）。该回调函数返回 true ,以使外壳程序继续进行评估；返回 false ,以中止评估。有两种可能的回调函数供用户实现：

trans-unit.source: When the server is asked to provide a document type that cannot be determined by the MIME Type Settings, the server uses this default type.
trans-unit.target: 当服务器被要求提供一个无法由MIME类型设置确定的文档类型时,服务器会使用这个默认类型。

trans-unit.source: When the shell starts, it starts a single evaluator process. This process, together with any local processes that it spawns, is referred to as a job. Only the current job, which is said to be connected, can perform operations with standard I/O. All other jobs, which are said to be detached, are blocked if they attempt to use standard I/O.
trans-unit.target: Shell启动时，它将启动一个评估程序。该过程及其产生的任何本地过程都称为 job 。只有当前的作业（据说已 connected ）才能使用标准I / O执行操作。所有其他的工作，这是说要 detached ，被 blocked ，如果他们试图使用标准I / O。

trans-unit.source: When the size of all received requests exceeds trans_req_maxsize.
trans-unit.target: 当所有接收到的请求的大小超过 trans_req_maxsize 时。

trans-unit.source: When the specified event occurs, the function Function is called as:
trans-unit.target: 当发生指定事件时，函数 Function 称为：

trans-unit.source: When the supervisor terminates, then the next higher-level supervisor takes some action. It either restarts the terminated supervisor or terminates itself.
trans-unit.target: 当主管终止时,那么下一个更高级别的主管就会采取一些行动。它要么重新启动被终止的主管,要么自己终止。

trans-unit.source: When the timer finally expires, a "megaco segments not received" (459) error message is sent to the other side and the user is notified with a segment timeoutUserReply in either the handle_trans_reply callback function or the return value of the call function.
trans-unit.target: 当定时器期满最后，一个“MEGACO段未接收”（459）的错误消息被发送到另一侧，并且用户与通知 segment timeout UserReply 无论是在 handle_trans_reply 回调函数或返回值 call 功能。

trans-unit.source: When the timer reaches 0 and expires, the driver entry function timeout is called.
trans-unit.target: 当计时器达到 0 并到期时，将调用驱动程序进入功能 timeout 。

trans-unit.source: When the timer reaches an intermediate expire, the request is resent and the timer is restarted.
trans-unit.target: 当定时器达到中间过期时,重新发送请求并重新启动定时器。

trans-unit.source: When the timer reaches an intermediate expire, the timer is restarted.
trans-unit.target: 当定时器达到中间过期时,重新启动定时器。

trans-unit.source: When the timer reaches an intermediate expire, the timer restarted.
trans-unit.target: 当定时器达到中间过期时,定时器重新启动。

trans-unit.source: When the timer reaches the final expire, either the function megaco:call will return with {error, timeout} or the callback function handle_trans_reply will be called with UserReply = {error, timeout} (if megaco:cast was used).
trans-unit.target: 当计时器达到最后期限时，函数 megaco:call 将返回 {error, timeout} 或回调函数 handle_trans_reply 将被 UserReply = {error, timeout} 调用（如果使用了megaco megaco:cast ）。

trans-unit.source: When the tracing is completed, stop the tracer with ttb:stop/0,1 and format the trace log with ttb:format/1,2 (if there is anything to format).
trans-unit.target: 跟踪完成后，请使用 ttb:stop/0,1 停止跟踪程序，并使用 ttb:format/1,2 格式化跟踪日志（如果有任何要格式化的内容）。

trans-unit.source: When the transaction sender receives a request which is already "in storage" (indicated by the transaction id) it is assumed to be a resend and everything stored is sent. This could happen if the values of the trans_timer and the request_timer is not properly chosen.
trans-unit.target: 当交易发送方收到已经“正在存储”的请求（由交易ID指示）时，将其视为重新发送，并发送所有存储的内容。如果未正确选择 trans_timer 和 request_timer 的值，则可能会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: When the user has processed a transaction request in its callback function, the Megaco application assembles a transaction reply, encodes it using the selected encoding module and sends the message back by invoking the callback function:
trans-unit.target: 当用户在其回调函数中处理了一个交易请求后,Megaco应用程序组装一个交易回复,使用选定的编码模块进行编码,并通过调用回调函数将消息发送回来。

trans-unit.source: When the web server is started at application start time, the properties are to be fetched from a configuration file that can consist of a regular Erlang property list, that is, [{Option, Value}], where Option = property() and Value = term(), followed by a full stop, or for backwards compatibility, an Apache-like configuration file. If the web server is started dynamically at runtime, a file can still be specified but also the complete property list.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序启动时启动Web服务器时，将从配置文件中获取属性，该配置文件可以包含常规的Erlang属性列表，即 [{Option, Value}] ，其中 Option = property() 和 Value = term() ，后跟句号，或者为了向后兼容，是一个类似Apache的配置文件。如果Web服务器在运行时动态启动，则仍然可以指定文件，但也可以指定完整的属性列表。

trans-unit.source: When the whole driver is unloaded. Every resource allocated by the driver is to be freed.
trans-unit.target: 当整个驱动程序被卸载后。驱动程序分配的每一个资源都要被释放。

trans-unit.source: When the window (terminal) size changes on the client side, it can send a message to the server side to inform it of the new dimensions. No API function generates this event.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端上的窗口（终端）大小更改时，它可以向服务器端发送消息以通知其新尺寸。没有API函数生成此事件。

trans-unit.source: When there are no generators or bit string generators, a list comprehension returns either a list with one element (the result of evaluating Expr) if all filters are true or an empty list otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 当没有生成器或位字符串生成器时，如果所有过滤器均为true ，则列表推导将返回带有一个元素的列表（评估 Expr 的结果），否则返回空列表。

trans-unit.source: When there are no more objects in the table, '$end_of_table' is returned.
trans-unit.target: 当表中没有更多对象时，将返回 '$end_of_table' 。

trans-unit.source: When there are only simple restrictions on the key position, qlc uses dets:lookup/2 to look up the keys. When that is not possible, the whole table is traversed. Option traverse determines how this is done:
trans-unit.target: 当键位置只有简单的限制时， qlc 使用 dets:lookup/2 查找键。如果不可能，则遍历整个表。选项 traverse 确定如何完成此操作：

trans-unit.source: When there are only simple restrictions on the key position, QLC uses lookup/2 to look up the keys. When that is not possible, the whole table is traversed. Option traverse determines how this is done:
trans-unit.target: 当键位置仅有简单限制时，QLC使用 lookup/2 查找键。如果不可能，则遍历整个表。选项 traverse 确定如何完成此操作：

trans-unit.source: When there is no risk of confusion, elements of Sets are identified with the sets they represent. For example, if U is the result of calling union/2 with S1 and S2 as arguments, then U is said to be the union of S1 and S2. A more precise formulation is that Set(U) is the union of Set(S1) and Set(S2).
trans-unit.target: 如果没有混淆的风险，则可以使用集合所代表的集合来标识集合的元素。例如，如果U是使用S1和S2作为参数调用 union/2 的结果，则称U为S1和S2的联合。更精确的表述是Set（U）是Set（S1）和Set（S2）的并集。

trans-unit.source: When this argument is removed, a final CPU topology to use is determined at emulator boot time.
trans-unit.target: 当这个参数被删除时,在仿真器启动时将确定最终要使用的CPU拓扑结构。

trans-unit.source: When this flag is specified, the linked-in driver must manually acknowledge that the port has been successfully started using erl_driver:erl_drv_init_ack(). This allows the implementor to make the erlang:open_port exit with badarg after some initial asynchronous initialization has been done.
trans-unit.target: 指定此标志后，链接的驱动程序必须使用 erl_driver:erl_drv_init_ack() 手动确认端口已成功启动。这允许实现 badarg 在完成一些初始的异步初始化之后，使用badarg使 erlang:open_port 退出。

trans-unit.source: When this function executes within a transaction, several processes running on different nodes can concurrently execute the function raise/2 without interfering with each other.
trans-unit.target: 当此功能在事务中执行时，在不同节点上运行的多个进程可以同时执行功能 raise/2 ,而不会互相干扰。

trans-unit.source: When this function is called the initiating erlang:open_port call is returned as if the start function had just been called. It can only be used when flag ERL_DRV_FLAG_USE_INIT_ACK has been set on the linked-in driver.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数时，将返回启动 erlang:open_port 调用，就好像刚刚调用了 start 函数一样。仅当在链接的驱动程序上设置了标志 ERL_DRV_FLAG_USE_INIT_ACK 时，才可以使用它。

trans-unit.source: When this function is called with a list of certificate options; it generates a configuration with just one node certificate where cacerts contains the root cert and the intermediate certs that should be presented to a peer. In this case the same root cert must be used for all peers. This is useful in for example an Erlang distributed cluster where any node, towards another node, acts either as a server or as a client depending on who connects to whom. The generated certificate contains a subject altname, which is not needed in a client certificate, but makes the certificate useful for both roles.
trans-unit.target: 当使用证书选项列表调用此函数时；它生成仅带有一个节点证书的配置，其中 cacerts 包含应提供给对等方的根证书和中间证书。在这种情况下，必须对所有对等方使用相同的根证书。例如，这在Erlang分布式群集中很有用，在该群集中，朝向另一个节点的任何节点都取决于谁与谁连接，充当服务器或客户端。生成的证书包含主题altname，客户端证书中不需要该主题altname，但是会使证书对两个角色都有用。

trans-unit.source: When this function is called with a map containing client and server chain specifications; it generates both a client and a server certificate chain where the cacerts returned for the server contains the root cert the server should trust and the intermediate certificates the server should present to connecting clients. The root cert the server should trust is the one used as root of the client certificate chain. Vice versa applies to the cacerts returned for the client. The root cert(s) can either be pre-generated with pkix_test_root_cert/2, or if options are specified; it is (they are) generated.
trans-unit.target: 当使用包含客户端和服务器链规范的映射调用此函数时；它会生成客户端和服务器证书链，其中为服务器返回的 cacerts 包含服务器应信任的根证书，以及服务器应提供给连接客户端的中间证书。服务器应信任的根证书是用作客户端证书链根的证书。反之亦然，适用于为客户返回的 cacerts 。根证书可以使用 pkix_test_root_cert/2 预先生成，也可以使用指定的选项生成；它是（它们）生成的。

trans-unit.source: When this function is called, *value_size is to contain the size of the value buffer.
trans-unit.target: 调用此函数时， *value_size 将包含 value 缓冲区的大小。

trans-unit.source: When this function is executed inside a transaction-context, it returns true, otherwise false.
trans-unit.target: 在事务上下文中执行此函数时，它将返回 true ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: When this is triggered, the previous path through the pattern is searched for the most recent (*MARK) that has the same name. If one is found, the "bumpalong" advance is to the subject position that corresponds to that (*MARK) instead of to where (*SKIP) was encountered. If no (*MARK) with a matching name is found, (*SKIP) is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 触发时,通过模式的前一条路径搜索具有相同名称的最近(*MARK)。如果找到了一个,"bumpalong "前进到对应于该(*MARK)的主题位置,而不是遇到(*SKIP)的位置。如果没有找到具有匹配名称的(*MARK),则忽略(*SKIP)。

trans-unit.source: When this mapping is used, insertion and deletion in the original Mnesia table is slower, with a factor O(log n). The read access is not affected.
trans-unit.target: 当使用这种映射时,原Mnesia表中的插入和删除速度较慢,系数为O(log n)。读取访问不受影响。

trans-unit.source: When this option is set to false, which is default, an RST received from the TCP peer is treated as a normal close (as though an FIN was sent). A caller to gen_tcp:recv/2 gets {error, closed}. In active mode, the controlling process receives a {tcp_closed, Socket} message, indicating that the peer has closed the connection.
trans-unit.target: 当此选项设置为 false 时（默认情况下），将从TCP对等方接收到的RST视为正常关闭（就像已发送FIN一样）。 gen_tcp:recv/2 的调用者获得 {error, closed} 。在活动模式下，控制进程收到 {tcp_closed, Socket} 消息，指示对等方已关闭连接。

trans-unit.source: When this option is specified, the "start of line" and "end of line" constructs match immediately following or immediately before internal newlines in the subject string, respectively, as well as at the very start and end. This is equivalent to Perl option /m and can be changed within a pattern by a (?m) option setting. If there are no newlines in a subject string, or no occurrences of ^ or $ in a pattern, setting multiline has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 指定此选项后，“行首”和“行尾”结构分别与主题字符串中的内部换行符紧接或紧接，也恰好位于开头和结尾。这等效于Perl选项 /m ,并且可以通过 (?m) 选项设置在模式内进行更改。如果主题字符串中没有换行符，或者模式中没有出现 ^ 或 $ ，则设置 multiline 行符无效。

trans-unit.source: When this option is used, the result of write/2 calls can prematurely be reported as successful, and if a write error occurs, the error is reported as the result of the next file operation, which is not executed.
trans-unit.target: 使用此选项时， write/2 调用的结果可能会过早报告为成功，并且如果发生写错误，则该错误将报告为下一个文件操作（不执行）的结果。

trans-unit.source: When time-out occurs, Common Test never aborts the ongoing test case, as this can leave the SUT in an undefined, and possibly bad, state. Instead Common Test, by default, finishes the current test run before stopping. If flag force_stop is specified, Common Test stops when the current test job is finished. If flag force_stop is specified with skip_rest, Common Test only completes the current test case and skips the remaining tests in the test job.
trans-unit.target: 发生超时时， Common Test 永远不会中止正在进行的测试用例，因为这可能会使SUT处于未定义的状态，甚至可能是错误的状态。相反， Common Test 默认情况下会在停止之前完成当前测试运行。如果指定了标志 force_stop ，则当前测试作业完成后， Common Test 停止。如果标志 force_stop 与指定 skip_rest ， Common Test 只完成当前的测试用例，并跳过在测试工作中剩余的测试。

trans-unit.source: When to use a Sub-agent
trans-unit.target: 何时使用子代理

trans-unit.source: When trace flag call is set on a process, function calls are traced on that process if a trace pattern is set for the called function.
trans-unit.target: 在进程上设置跟踪标志 call 时，如果为被调用函数设置了跟踪模式，则在该进程上跟踪函数调用。
